name: WalletHub
review:
Wells Fargo Personal Loan Review
 
Wells Fargo personal loans have many positives, including high loan amounts, a lack of fees, and low rates. Wells Fargo is also one of the few major lenders with both unsecured and secured personal loans.
 
Wells Fargo offers personal loans between $3,000 and $100,000, with APRs ranging from 5.24% to 24.49% for unsecured loans. That’s one of the lowest minimum APRs available and a fairly low maximum compared to many competing lenders. Wells Fargo’s unsecured loans don’t charge origination fees, either. And while there is a $39 late fee, you get a 10-day grace period after a missed payment to avoid it.
 
Wells Fargo’s secured personal loans have a $75 origination fee and require money in a Wells Fargo CD or savings account as collateral. Their APRs range from 8% to 19.5%. These secured loans let people take out a loan with better terms than they’d get without collateral, while still earning interest on their own money in the bank. People who pay on time will never lose their collateral.
 
Another advantage of borrowing from Wells Fargo is that they serve people throughout the U.S. They have over 5,700 branches where you can apply in person with a credit specialist. And while Wells Fargo has had a past scandal involving opening fraudulent accounts, that didn’t have anything to do with their personal loans.
 
Wells Fargo Personal Loan Review Highlights

Wells Fargo personal loan rates: 5.24% to 24.49% for unsecured; 8% to 19.5% for secured.
Loan amounts: $3,000 to $100,000.
Origination fee: $0 for unsecured; $75 for secured.
Late fee: $39, after 10-day grace period.
Payoff timelines: 12 to 60 months. That’s pretty standard, though some lenders offer periods of 84+ months.
Funding timeline: Up to 3 business days for approval and 1 additional business day for delivery of the funds.
Wells Fargo personal loan credit requirements: 660 for an unsecured loan. But Wells Fargo offers secured loans to people with bad credit.
ID requirements: You must be a U.S. citizen or permanent resident. You can apply using either a Social Security number or Individual Taxpayer Identification Number.
Co-signers Allowed?: Yes. Only some lenders allow applicants to apply with a co-signer. Wells Fargo is one of them.
Pre-qualification: You can’t pre-qualify for a Wells Fargo personal loan, but you can estimate your rates with Wells Fargo’s calculator.

Wells Fargo is one of the largest banks in the U.S., and they’re well-known for having a wide range of personal banking products, including credit cards and mortgages. But you shouldn’t discount their personal loans. Wells Fargo offers some worthwhile terms for people with good and bad credit alike. Below, you can see how WalletHub rates Wells Fargo in our three major personal loan review categories: Terms, Requirements & Application, and Reviews & Transparency.
 
Wells Fargo Ratings by Category
 
Terms: 4.6 / 5
 
Requirements & Application: 3.8 / 5
 
Reviews & Transparency: 3.3 / 5
 
Overall Score: 4.2 / 5
 
These scores reflects how close a loan offer is to WalletHub’s definition of a 5-star loan. For more information, please read WalletHub’s full methodology.

review: I've been with Wells Fargo since they acquired Wachovia. I have had nothing but problems with them since. When asked about the holds, I was given two different explanations in the SAME phone call by two SPECIALISTS. Each time they've done this I've had to spend an hour or more on the phone and an acceptable resolution only when I've threatened further negative action, like closing my account and switching banks. Today it has happened AGAIN. This was the last time. I have never borrowed a dollar from them in over a decade, have never been offered ANYTHING by them for my patronage. They have done nothing but siphon money from me with their dubious overdraft fees which quadruple the amount overdrawn and then purposely put holds on checks so more charges accumulate. They've had black eye after black eye with the feds now limiting their loan cap as a result of shady behavior amongst other sanctions and lawsuits. At this point I'd rather hide my money in an old mayonnaise jar than keep it in Wells Fargo. It'd be safer I think. Worst banking experience of my 45 years on earth.

review: Rewards are minimal. Offer higher rewards for specific stores, monthly subscriptions, memberships, none of which I shop at, are not in my area, and/or do not apply toward common purchases like groceries, gas, household use, drugstore purchases, and omit certain stores or online vendors. Only reason I keep is to have long term account in good standing. Not able to make payments from multiple accounts, multiple times a month. I.e. wanting to use safer payment of a credit card which offers more protection against personal liability for fraudulent charges as compared to debit cards which do not have this protection. Limits ability to pay on account after each purchase. Also limits ability to make payments from multiple different personal accounts. I.e. wanting to make payments from multiple accounts you have established for different categories/purchase type/accounting categories. Leads to unnecessary carryover balances and interest penalties if not paid in full at statement end because you have exceeded number of payments allowed per month. Why is this even a rule?

review: I've been trying to refinance for almost 3 months now. On day two of the process I informed my mortgage consultant the law office / title provider that I chose. Today almost 3 months later I'm being told that my refinance is going to have to be delayed another week or two because of this "change" i.e. me wanting to use my title provider that I chose two days after I started this process. I will never ever use Wells Fargo for any type of loan or banking in the future. My original loan with a small company was so smooth and flawless I had no idea what I was in for with Wells Fargo.Do yourself a favor and go with a smaller bank when getting a home loan or refinancing. They may end up selling your mortgage to a bigger company like Wells Fargo but throughout the process you will get much better customer service. People who actually remember what you say or email and care about what you say to them so you're not repeating yourself many many times and also having to fill out the same form many times. A mega bank like Wells Fargo is trying assist too many customers that you almost can't blame the multiple people they put in charge of your process. You are just a number, you are not a person.

I filed a dispute and they sided with the merchant even when I had proof that I did not receive the product. The only “proof” the merchant had was that said it was delivered to me. I have the actual Fed Ex tracking info that shows the travel history. Made it to my local hub and then re-routed back to merchant. Proof of delivery along with a signature shows that it was delivered back to the merchant. Wells Fargo denied my dispute and told me to take it up with the merchant. So again. Wells Fargo does not stand behind its long-term customers. Instead, it stands up for a fraudulent business.

name: asirise8
review: I am African-American female I have been banking with Wells Fargo for the past three years. When I start a new adventure of opening my own business, Wells Fargo would not give me a business account, Wells Fargo would not give me a business loan even though I had the funds in the account that showed I can pay that loan back off. I am now stranded in a city where I know no one because Wells Fargo‘s account says that the transaction for my room went through however the hotel is not showing the transaction on their end. I don’t advise anybody of African-American descent to open an account with Wells Fargo.

name: Annlee
review: Only have a mortgage with them, love my monthly payments on time no issues. Only issue is I have a large interest rate trying to get modified but not easy if you dont have high credit score.

name: Marcia Walters
review: I applied for a refinance of my home loan with Wells Fargo in January. The initial process went well until there was no communication from Wells Fargo for 2 weeks. I called/wrote 4 Wells Fargo mortgage supervisors and those who had been working with me. No return calls or emails. Then one employee who had been unavailable let me know that my loan was canceled due to “no communication”.The person who was previously working with me left Wells Fargo and the no communication was from their side. It took some time to get back on track, I was then told my rate would be locked in . Shortly after that I was told by what sounded like a scripted phone call that my loan had been declined. I had then been contacted by the complaint department who never called me back. My guess is that my current rate is higher than the loan I applied for and they would have lost interest. They also owe me money from the appraisal which did not need to be done.

name: maria reynoso
review: I am a very very satisfied and happy customer I am so grateful for your link app guiding can make it better for me thank you sincerely.

name: Marvin Montour
review: Worst customer service. Terrible bank account to have I wished I had never opened a bank account with them. It’s very inconvenient to start a new account with another bank.

name: MT Mapes
review: This is a GREAT rewards credit card and the $150 cash back is terrific. If you spend $500 in the first 3 months they put the $150 in your account quickly.  Most cards take up to 3 months or longer to get return on any cash back rewards offer. It is really hard to find a credit card that offers 0% on purchases and transfers.  And most companies do not offer deals for 15 months.  I am was surprised by some of the poor reviews.  Highly recommend this card.  1.5% on all transactions is a deal. And you can redeem rewards by transferring to bank account or withdrawal at ATM.  That's pretty impressive.

name: Ebony
review: Wells fargo is the worst company to do business with. I've been a loyal customer with 3 accts for 15yrs. They DON'T VALUE LOYAL CUSTOMERS or should I say loyal African American customers. I've been waiting a year for a senior exc. To call me but they continue to send emails that someone will contact me but I'm still waiting. WILL BE CLOSING ALL 3 ACCTS if I could give zero stars I would

name: legzalmighty
review: Wells Fargo is full of it.  I have been with this bank for over 21 years and someone  stole my identity and ruined my credit.  I am working on rebuilding my credit and I asked them for a $5000 loan and they turned me down flat.  My paycheck goes there every two weeks and they turned me down.  They can take the money right out of my check but they just want to try and keep people down.  I plan on leaving and taking my business elsewhere.  I cannot believe they would do this to me after all this time.  People, don't bank here.  Take your money somewhere else.  They're not even worth the headache.

name: Norma
review: Like this card because monthly payments are suitable for my budget.  I always carry it around and can be used for groceries, home improvement and dinning. Really helps to have it in your wallet.

name: Lee
review: This Wells Fargo Cash Wise Visa® card has decent rewards and zero interest balance transfer of which I have just now paid off the entire balance.

name: Shannon
review: I really liked Wellsfargo. They stand for their name: great customer service representative to understand your preferences and availability to help you get account started, great financial department: they can help you with the best credit cards your type of credit and your financial means along with their loan department, and their one and only tellers: good and cheerful attitudes and fast-paced for all account holders.

name: Roberto
review: Muy lentos los reembolsos y no se puede utilizar hasta que no se alcance el mínimo de 25 usd, muy diferente a casi todas las tarjetas

name: Antouan Benbalit
review: Horrible company. Aside from all of the negative press that they have gotten for opening accounts in customers' names, their service overall is abhorrent. The UI on their app needs a lot of work. I've been banking with Wells Fargo a long time and I don't think I have ever encountered someone as unpleasant as one of their customer service rep managers named Mo. A very short, disingenuous, deceitful and rude person. I was charged 2 overdraft fees that I shouldn't have been. Instead of getting it figured out for me, he talked me off of the phone, refused to share his supervisor's information and was generally dismissive. People like him don't deserve to work. Horrible person.

name: Ricky
review: WELLS FARGO BANK etc...Once again is up to their ILLEGAL PRACTICES ...And the E.O (executive office) KNOWS THIS!!! Customer Service is at its worst. Not everyone, you have to find the right representative. EXECUTIVE OFFICE doesn't seem to care... Wells Fargo Bank. Terrible

name: Christopher
review: Not accurate still on reports I've been trying to get this off my credit for 10+ years and it’s still on here I’m not satisfied with the results they kept taking it off and putting back on

name: fayelover32
review: This is not a bank worth trusting. Will do nothing if your account is compromised or your card is stolen except replace the card. All they care about is how best to make your life harder than it already is. I regret ever banking with them.

name: Rachelle
review: Easy to pay,  payments post immediately when I pay from my checking account.  Only thing I don't like is I've never been late on  any bills for 6 years and Wells Fargo have never increased my credit line even though I never carry a balance with any of my credit cards

name: William
review: I love this card Wells Fargo has been good to me don’t know why others complain, pay your bills on time in full if possible keep your spending under 30% and you will enjoy a high CL and no issues

name: Brian
review: No problems with the service I received. The store close locally so I seldom if ever patronize the company. If I do so in the future, I will pay cash.

name: Tim Perkins
review: Wow, just called Wells Fargo to look at getting this card.  Sales team isn't taking calls now and the only way is to apply on-line.  This card isn't even shown on their credit card offerings on their site.

name: John T Riccobono
review: Their not so secret agenda, OBVIOUS, GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE AT ALL LEVELS!(Phone, availability, ATMs, in Bank experience! They seem to have it all)! SECURITY, SECURE!J.R.JUST MY EXPERIENCE I'M SURE OTHERS HAVE HAD.

name: Jonathon
review: It is great for transferring a balance that you can pay off in 18 months, but that is all it is really good for.  Their app is good and their card feels a little more durable for some reason

name: Jennifer Garrett
review: I have had several accounts with various banks and credit cards and Wells Fargo is by the far the worst. Compared to other banks like Capital One, they are not user-friendly at all. Capital One allows you to cancel payments and immediately gives you your points/cash back. Wells Fargo does not let you stop online payments once requested (even if it was an accident), and you have to wait at least a month to get your rewards. Even then, you are only allowed to spend your rewards in $25 increments, which is absurd. Capital One allows you to use your cash back in any amount. After this next bill, I will be cancelling my Wells Fargo account.

name: Mitchell
review: Low rate, great customer service. Wouldn’t use anyone else for a mortgage. If I ever refinance down the road, I’ll definitely use Wells Fargo and none of other horrible recommendations I’ve received lately.

name: twaugh1000
review: Do not open a business account with Wells Fargo! They will steal your money and make it difficult as possible to receive your money back. Also, customer service is horrible and the mount zion location is HOOD! Again do business with them at your own risk! It is a depreciating brand!

name: melvintonya2015
review: I don't normally write reviews unless the company is really good or has horrible service. Recently I was issued a check from Wells Fargo Auto due to an overcharge to my account from their carelessness. They issued the check in the wrong name so I requested a corrected reissue of the check. I originally began my complaint December 2020 and we are now in April 2021, they claim to be backed up. There is absolutely no way they are that backed up. The IRS isn't that backed up getting checks issued to everyone in the United States. AGAIN, someone has dropped the ball and not doing their job. If I have to blast this company name on every platform in order to receive what is due to because of their error, I will. Word of mouth can either break a company or make a company, my voice may not completely break the company but I sure will be heard and be part of the group who aren't afraid to voice their concerns and issues.  I'm actually on hold right now for the past 30 minutes with Dio at the executive office, instead of her listening she decides to place me on mute as if I don't understand how call centers operate, another example of poor customer service. She doesn't have the right to get frustrated of my complaint of not receiving an answer as to why it's taking so long.  It's not even about the check for me, it's the principle that they made errors from the beginning without having an explanation as to why and how I was overcharged up until now still not able to explain why it's taking so long to redistribute the correct check. If anyway possible avoid Wells Fargo completely.

name: Robert
review: I use this for small purchases to help my credit build-up. BUT, I get unanswered credit checks from places that shouldn't even be checking my credit cause I've NOT given permission to do so. When YOU guys checked my credit in January of 2021, that made my credit score go down while I'm trying to build it up. I'm not sure why you guys checked it after receiving money back cause Family Leisure sold us a lemon pool. Seems like they come out better than my wife and I on this matter. SO, why did you guys check my credit on January 2021?

name: Jerry Fang
review: I've been with Wells Fargo since I'd graduated high school in 2000. I was young, dumb, and broke during my college year and screwed up my Wells Fargo account. In 2012, I finally went back to Wells Fargo to open an account and they've given me a second chance, although I was on probation for 2 years. They did not issue me a regular Visa Debit card, but give me a secure debit card and I can only use it to withdraw money at ATM and cannot make cash/check deposit at ATM till I become in good standard. Now, I am in very good standard with Wells Fargo and I tend to keep it that way. I even got 2 of their credit cards and just finished paying both my cards off. Only think I dislike about Wells Fargo is their fees. $10 a month if you don't have direct deposit of $500 a month, and their credit cards interest is pretty high. All and all, I am happy with Wells Fargo and happy they've giving me a second chance.

name: Jamie
review: They cost too much. Customer service sucks. Some contract details hidden in fine print within the original mortgage documents. Cosst too high to refi

name: sboukn3434
review: Wells Fargo is the absolutely the  worst bank in the United States . Customer service is non existant . Fees are ridiculous. Closed my checking account . Moved my mortgage, and finally moving my business accounts . . Trust me you do not want anything to do with this institution .

name: Gerald
review: I paid the card in full on date due. Wells Fargo stated funds unavailable and repaid card and Wells Fargo again stated funds unavailable Contacted Wells Fargo on phone and rep stated payment was duplicate and stated funds overpaid would be returned Then next letter requested additional interest payment due payment was made Then Wells Fargo sent letter that payment was late Again called Wells Fargo and paid off balance This is not a missed payment and needs to be revised

name: Jeffrey Gillette
review: wells fargo has been busted for opening up fraudulent accounts, committing mortgage fraud. wells fargo has agreed to pay $3 billion to settle criminal charges and a civil action stemming from its widespread mistreatment of customers in its community bank over a 14-year period, the justice department announced on friday. from 2002 to 2016, employees used fraud to meet impossible sales goals. latest episode--i paid to wire money into wells fargo.  i called 4 branches and the 800 number so they would have my money ready.  the tarzana and woodland hills and encino and northridge branches phones went to messages saying they are currently not answering the phone. during regular business hours!  i go in and they could not give me all the money i needed that i wired in.

name: Michael Khater
review: I have been with Wells Fargo since they changed from Wachovia in NJ since back in 2006. The way they dealt with me during the pandemic changed everything. I realized they take advantage of normal people and are running the show like thugs. I am running as fast as I can away from this business. It does not deserve to be a bank. They hold my deposits for 10 DAYS (twice in three months) and leech off of overdraft fees that result from the hold they placed. So, as a result, bills create overdrafts, and you get charges that even during a pandemic they refuse to reimburse. RUN. FAR AWAY. I am closing my account and never ever going inside a wells fargo bank ever again. I have never been treated in such an unethical and disgusting way.

name: sophie M ainsworth
review: Wells Fargo made me homeless and then kicked me out of the bank when I came in looking dirty and dingy with my suitcase. My I.D. and debit card were stolen. The banker that waved to me everytime I went in and said hello would not say that she knew me. When I was thrown out of the bank, I sat out waiting on my ride. I did not ask anyone for money. The security guard came out and said I was making them look bad and made me get off their property. I had an open Checking and Savings account with them. They treated me so terrible when I was already at my lowest. I still tear up about this.

name: Atia
review: I've been with Wells Fargo for years before it was called Wells Fargo but they really have been good to me one of the best credit cards I have

name: Michelle Morris
review: Horrible HORRIBLE! I’d give negative five stars. They do not communicate. They hold up the loan for things THEY failed to do, and request the same document over and over. Be prepared to call every single day because they will never call you to tell you there is a holdup. They only do that if you call them first, and then you wait usually 1-2 weeks for a return call. They do not put all the documents they want in your portal, and then will use an excuse they are waiting on a supposed non-received document. Keep all your proof, they will continually ask for the same things, They will continue to tell you it’s not there. If you tell them you are going to another lender, they say, “we have everything we need, it will go through shortly”. So you wait about a month, then call to see what’s the holdup. Rinse and repeat...They do not care about resolving the issues at all. It’s all blamed on mystery departments that you have no access to, and the people you have access to give wrong information. Repeatedly. Even the managers.

name: Sandra
review: I started with my Wellsfargo card with no interest for 15 months which will help me when is time to pay my purchases.  It's a good card.

name: William Jones
review: I need 1000 to let you know how bad Wells Fargo is. 25 years & they treat you like dirt during Covid Crisis.

name: Thomas
review: I have been a Wells Fargo customer for about 30 years. I have no complaints. The banking personnel are friendly and knowledgeable and their customer service is excellent. I would recommend Wells Fargo for all of your banking needs without any reservation!!!

name: Matthew Cluck
review: Dealing with them is always miserable. Just found out they failed to properly notarize my Lien Release letter when I tried to use it at the DMV. The first person I talked to was polite, but couldn't help.  Full two hours on hold and no resolution, so I can't sell my car until they bother to answer my phone call. dealing with them has often been difficult, but that one is the worst so far...

name: alberts
review: Wells Fargo is not helpful with accounts or information. Their approvals are mixed inspire of Wallet hub odds given. It is frustrating

name: Benjamin
review: Points don’t really add up to much and it’s Wells Fargo... not the best bank but better than some of the others. Daily APR is high but so long as you pay off in they're ok.

name: john_delaney62
review: Since the change from Wachovia, this Wells Fargo transition has been an, “ over the top “ nothing but ,extraordinary, banking experience !  Thank you so much for making my daily banking ( Being a Senior Citizen ) a pleasurable new and easy Task ! Keep up the Good Fight for we “Old Folks“.  No longer shall we become another ? footprint ? in the sands, ( ?along with the the Dinosaurs? ), but now, as a Passenger on the Stagecoach, of your 6 dynamic pulling horses,  shall find the selective solitude of financial freedom ? ???? .

name: Kendra Thompson
review: This bank is a total ripoff!! I’ve had their credit card for twenty five years, with only one measly increase. The APR is ridiculous!! I have never been offered a promotion of any kind, even though I’ve never missed a payment. I can’t get rid of this card fast enough.

name: jimculshawjr112469
review: No issues with processing at all.  Easy to use app.  Very satisfied with customer service.  Easy to contact and get answers on questions when needed.

name: Africa
review: Superb customer service. Great card to add to anyone's wallet. Dillards offers wonderful sales and great fraud protection insurance.

name: Tomi
review: As long as i have gone through wells Fargo i like it because I can always find one no matter the town. I also enjoy the customer service they provide me with

name: Tanesa
review: I love Wells Fargo as a bank and have loved being able to access all of their help in building my credit. They approved my spouse and I for $2,000 and made it the easiest process for both of us to verify our income and employment. We support this financial institution.

name: Raul
review: All services ok excellent bank THE BEST always banking with this institution had two mortgages with them. Also line of credit and few more activities.

name: oscars_20
review: Be careful with this card from Wells Fargo. They offer cash advances and when you decide to use this benefit  Wells Fargo will lower your credit limit with no notice. Harming your credit score.

name: Diele K
review: Very easy to apply for the loan and has been simple to pay as set up for a monthly ach debit on the same day of every month. Great staff and always a pleasure to bank with Wells Fargo.

name: Jeffery
review: Very convenient,no issues with disputes, over all a great resource to have! May very well get another card with this company. No worries

name: Maria
review: Thank you nice services and quality work excellent work in time ,nothing much more to help with this app and the new update has to be very good for me

name: jettistar36
review: No problem,  I  applied for this card got approved in less than 3 mins with a credit line of $5,500. I love Wells Fargo I have been with Wells Fargo over 15yrs never had any issues with them, so I will continue to do business with them.

name: daxdiamond
review: What is your credit score/credit utilization/inquiries, etc?

name: James Gomeringer
review: This company has gone downhill enormously !!!     Small things matter.Recenty,...I went to the ATM to DEPOSIT a check. It was outa cash,...so evidently, it was out of service because I couldn't deposit the check. Ok, I'll go to another ATM. Outa service.  Can someone please explain why you can't deposit a check, even if you don't want any cash!!  Got a damaged note from a teller.Went to pay for lunch with it,...they wouldn't accept it. Another trip back to the bank.    Never did find an ATM that worked by the way.While I was at another branch to finally deposit the check inside. ...I came across a ATM tech working on their ATM. I told him about the other ATM's that weren't working.He tells me that they are due for service tomorrow.REALLY!!!         You can't drive half a mile to ensure proper service ?   The straw that broke the camel's back,...a couple of days ago,I finally accumulated enough money to replace the last 2 tires on my RV.     I go online, they are expensive, over 1k for both.Set it up.Something happened,.. wouldn't go through. Try it again,..no go.      I find out ( finally) Wells Fargo denied it.Blocked my debit card.Call them,. 20+ minute wait .Ended up calling them 3x ,.. wasted 2 hours, no tires ,and my card stayed blocked for the next 3 days.      They are more of a hindrance,then a help.I have a new bank while I wean myself from this bumbling, Incompetent bunch   Really bad customer service.I suggest that you find a more professional acting bank.

name: Derrick
review: Great service and I love there website easy to find what I am looking for and help me to monitor my credit report and show me how to improve my credit score

name: Katrina
review: Thank you love this app hoping to bring it up more thank you again for helping me make my credit keep going up to buy my new car!

name: David
review: Good card and a good line of credit and it has 0 % interest free for 18 month. I just got the card and can make big purchases without any interest

name: Alvaro
review: I bank with Wells Fargo... If you prove to be a loyal customer they will treat you right. I didn't even have to apply for this credit card. They sent me an invitation and I got approved instantly.

name: Dawn Lowery
review: Too big to care about their customers' needs. I've banked with Wells Fargo for over 7 years now. I've had theft identity fraud- questionable fees- no direct deposits on the weekend- and they like to hold on to your government deposits as long as they can to earn interest and leverage. I will be closing my account as soon as my direct deposits clear and opt for a bank that's not too big to offer the customer service that most smaller banks afford their customers.

name: Emory
review: Fought them over 60 day late payment dispute due to closing company never paying off mortgage balance when I sold home. Never resolved, they claim it happened in March'16 not July '16 when home was sold. It took them a month to determine this. I bear proof they are wrong but they say I'm wrong. Never will do business with them in any form, even had my wife close her accounts with them.

name: sjhlittlefish
review: Inherited my father’s account in 2008. Transferred it from Wells Fargo Advisors to Wells Trade and was ok until mother passed away in November 2020. Wanted to transfer her account at WF Advisors to my account at WellsTrade. Seems simple enough. NOPE!  Couldn’t find customer service. A continual exploration through the paper jungle. Fill out forms, more forms, wrong forms and after two months I couldn’t find a WellsTrade supervisor to talk to me. Customer service was unheard of. Told everyone I was going to transfer everything to Schwab. Went to Schwab and started the transfer. Took a little longer than I had intended but during that time I never heard from a single soul at WellsTrade or their make believe customer service department. The transfer is almost complete but to rub salt into the wound WellsTrade has charged me a $95 closing fee, Wells Fargo Advisors $125. TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE !!!!!!!!!

name: Gregory
review: Great financial institution I really appreciate the way I am treated and the attitude in which I am greeted with . Thank You

name: Sara
review: Wells Fargo credit is a great experience for me and I feel great about using the Wells Fargo credit card It was the best thing that happened in my life it also helps my credit score go through the roof.

name: pblashki
review: You would get better service and more integrity by leaving your money with a hobo under the bridge! Leaving WF after 6 years......No support for small business, I've had to get CC and loans through other banks as WF wouldn't help. I have all my personal and business banking with them, excellent credit score. Nothing but issues with PPP first and second draw ended up having to use someone else as they "lost" my application details due to a common glitch, then wouldn't help after acknowledging responsibility and told me I would be better to file a new application elsewhere..

name: Jen
review: Rate was really high, but loan was easy to obtain and repay. Easy to use website, linked nicely to other Wells Fargo accounts I have.

name: lafleure
review: My experience using WalletHub over the years has been exceptional, I enjoy spending time reading different scenarios and love their take on my debt and steps I can take to make it better. Love you WalletHub.

name: fastokie22
review: Other than mixing my info with my parents, they are customer focused and base line increases off of my payment history to them.  They also don't take weeks to remove an auto pay if needed..

name: Matt
review: Wells Fargo sucks! The minute I get a chance to switch banks I will! Nothing but problems with them. Their customer service sucks. Their automated banking sucks. Their management sucks.

name: Lisa
review: Thank you, not sure how this is helping me  but at least I can see what has changed on my accounts   My score is dropping because of this pandemic I just don’t have the money to pay them

name: Andre
review: Very good card. The only problem they take a long time to graduate you. If they would graduate earlier then it would be one of the best cards.

name: Gwen
review: I love my credit card, so easy to use and very easy to pay. I would tell anyone I know to get this card. I do think they could do I little better with the cash back.

name: Jose
review: Never increases your limit and when you dispute a charge it doesn't matter if you got proof you still lose it's only better to use it to buy a gallon of milk or a chocolate.

name: Alvin
review: My account was closed in error not by me Said I closed it ,I corrected them It was reopened right awayI was very happy no long waits on phone

name: Caroline Haire
review: I have to say I am disappointed with the timeline of helping someone with an ONLINE BILL PAY. OUR POWER WAS TURNED OFF and we had to pay $400 even though it has cleared my bank over 10 days. It has now been a week and no resolution or call. So paying $800 for a $400 power Bill. Not acceptable.

name: joannek_12
review: All's good with Wells Fargo. They take my payments out 1/2 in the beginning of the month and then other 1/2 around the 3rd week of the month. When COVID had work minimizing my hours they were able to suspend my payments. That all worked great for me!

name: jaime Welch
review: I am so disappointed in the experience I had with Wells Fargo. I have never been late and I even pay early on my monthly mortgage. I wanted to pay ahead on my monthly mortgage. I called to MAKE sure that if I pay ahead that it would apply to my monthly payment if I made advanced payments. The mortgage specialist on the phone indicated to me that it would automatically apply to my monthly payments unless otherwise specified. (This call by the way was on my phone bill and even though they claim they record all calls, they claimed they could not locate this call. Another person working for Wells Fargo found my phone call and the investigator would not listen to it and continued to claim that they had no record of it.) I made a payment ahead of time and they applied it to principal which is exactly why I called to make sure that it wouldn't do. I found this out later when I logged into my account. I saw that I had late fees and I was behind on payments because they applied my payment to principal. When I called to ask for them to apply my payment correctly, they denied me stating that the time frame allowable to make the change had expired. When I asked to speak with a supervisor they stated there was no one else to talk to. I demanded to speak with corporate and they finally transferred me to a compliance officer. She didn't do much at all and took days to just deny me. Apparently, they record all calls and even though I gave them the exact date and time of the phone call I made in the beginning, they conveniently denied having any record of my call even though It was clear on my phone bill record. I am a responsible person and have never had any issues. For them to treat me like this is absolutely disgusting. Wells Fargo forced me to pay an EXTRA monthly payment as a result of their error and was completely unwilling to be accountable for their actions. I am now refinancing with another company. Never again will I ever go through this institution again.

name: Jacqelyn
review: Suddenly started getting interest charges with purchases wasn't made fully aware of after a certain amount you get charged even more, besides that great card.

name: sonofamitchno3
review: Full access to rewards blocked by an arbitrary $25 increment requirement.  Pointlessly irritating, there are much better cards out there with comparable benefits (e.g. Silver) that do not jerk customers around trying to redeem their rewards.

name: aetherigroup
review: I like the card and the benefits offered. It is the best cc on the market today. Wells Fargo is a great bank and they really helped me get my credit right and the small business I own off the ground.  Pope

name: Jaynah
review: Never had a problem with this company. I might increase my credit relationship with wellsfargo. I have enjoyed working with this company.

name: Ahmad
review: This company is the worse. They have reported wrong things on my credit which has lowered my credit and I have such hard time to get them to remove them.

name: Robert
review: Great company. Good loans. Great support. Will use again when needing loans. Car is almost paid off! 2 months to go and it will be done

name: Amy Schlageter
review: Horrible experience with Wells Fargo Credit Care and they have no grace period during the COVID pandemic.  Our family was sick and were late 15 days of making our last payment and we were charged $822 (the interest of the 0% financing).  I accept it was my fault, but they were unwilling to work with us.  Very frustrated -  Be careful with doing business with this company.

name: Raelene Bond
review: I applied with a credit rating of 728 and I had a Very Good approval odd. I was denied. Received an email telling me they were reviewing my request. After waiting 2 days and hearing nothing else, I called and was notified by the automated system.

name: AD D
review: I have never done business with a company that does not offer a grace period. 26 dollar late fee a day after the due date. Its criminal. Dont do business with this organization. I will be leaving at my first opportunity.

name: Jerome
review: Great credit card. I love the fact that I can make payment in my Wells Fargo app. Staying on top of this credit card is super easy. My only complaint as of right now is that I have not been able to get a credit limit increase.

name: mholtz89
review: I had a mortgage with them before. I also have 3 saving accounts, 2 credit cards and 1 checking account. I also have had several car loans from them and a personal loan. Never a late payment. I was declined for a refinance loan today because according to them working at the same place for over a decade wasn't enough. They also claimed a combined income of over 100K a year (mortgage would be for a 270K home) was not enough income. They also stated they weren't sure I was dependable....again I've NEVER had a late payment if over 15 years. I have everything on autopay. They didn't even speak to me. They sent me a letter and then disappeared. The company clearly only cares about numbers. I'll be closing all my accounts with them and going elsewhere.

name: Orlando
review: Good card to have. Never had any issues with WF card. I would definitely recommend this card to anyone. Great compliment card if you already have WF for checking.

name: eadkins019
review: Checking and Savings accounts is okay-ish. Customer service isn't so great, I was hung up on 2 times while trying to file a complaint. They overdraft you for no absolute reasons, they won't stop false transactions and I was lied to face multiple times about me having overdraft protection. I was warned by multiple people to stay away from this bank and I should have listened. STAY AWAY!!!!

name: Mike W
review: Crooked joke of a company whether dealing with COVID or insurance claims. They will tell you one thing over the phone repeatedly then go back on their word and claim that they didn't say that. BEWARE, fraudulent company! I would look elsewhere for your banking needs. You will see many complaints about Wells Fargo online.

name: Fotis
review: I own less money to Wells Fargo credit card . I don’t understand why is high again .they have to report on time . They don’t have good benefits as well

name: Raymond
review: Wells Fargo takes good care of our car & home financing.  Thanks, been with them over 15 yrs and have done a good job helping us when needed.

name: Brandon
review: Great company and service they listen to you to solve your issues if you want to get tickets or a concert hall sit they can arrange it for you without any charges I do recommend this card

name: Jeremy Cummings
review: Nothing but the worst of experiences with this bank. This bank even opened a credit account under my name that stayed open a year before I noticed my credit report change. Be careful with doing business with these guys

name: Eric
review: I have had Wells Fargo for almost 6 months now, and this is the absolute best bank that I ever banked with, I have a checking and savings account with them and I am very pleased with the service that I receive on a day-to-day basis. Every time I call, each and every customer service rep is extremely polite, and professional. I have never had any issues with Wells Fargo regardless, service, my accounts, anything, They have the BEST, BEST bank account I have had. The mobile app is fantastic works like a charm! No lags, no issues, none of that, I love the 24/7 customer service, which is great! Again, I have NO complaints and I recommend Wells Fargo to everyone, GREAT JOB WF!

name: hahpetsitting
review: Got this card for furniture purchases and bought a new mattress! Zero interest for I think the first 18 months?? But I paid it off in under six so I can't remember exactly.

name: fitzb9544
review: Wells Fargo is the worst banking institution I have ever dealt with when it comes to general banks needs such as checking and savings accounts. The systems they have in place are designed to set you up for failure and charge you for everything. They make a simple process such as depositing cash a difficult process with policies that make no sense. Make sure you read the fine print and fully understand all the policies they have in place before choosing WellsFargo. They make NOTHING convenient or easy.

name: Dave
review: Has worked fine no problems handled the escrow with no issues Would be happy to use them again came to my house to do the paperwork and completed that quickly and easily did a good job of handling some special circumstances to make the process work

name: jkemps
review: I've been trying to move an acct from wf since aug. 2020.  Had to hire a lawyer to force them to comply.  Still not done and it's now almost feb. 2021 - about 6 months.  Never, ever do business with such a horrible company!

name: Michael
review: After bombarding me with mail begging me to apply for a credit line because of my great fico and credit scores I was turned down with no explanation. Why even tease your customers only to ding their credit with a hard inquiry? What kind of desk baboon with an abacus is making these decisions? You have access to customers' credit scores and cash flow, don't invite us just to shut us out and drop our scores 6 points, that isn't intelligent.

name: Rachel
review: I love my WF College Card! It's the perfect card to start off with as a college student looking to begin building credit. The application process was very easy and the card structure works well for me.

name: Linda
review: Used for unexpected purchase and install of mini split ductless HVAC. Transaction was easy and seamless and paid off in short order.

name: aliusama2001
review: This card ruined my credit score! I have never been late with payment and never overdrawn!! One time I had fraud activity on my checking account and I had to freeze it and I called Wells Fargo and gave them the new account info!! But they obviously did not do their job right because they attempted to get the payment from the frozen account!! I called again and again until they got it right finally!!! Then they decreased the limit of my credit! And left bad remark on my credit score!!! Don't get your credit ruined by bunch of loosers !! I just paid every thing off and never deal with them again!!!

name: Janice
review: I like my line of credit it comes in handy and is very convenient to use with my WF account. It’s not for everyone but works for me.

name: Sandra
review: Great bank. Gives people a chance to prove themselves. I have had a wells fargo account since I was 18 years old. They have me a shot when no one would.

name: Wanda
review: I'm very happy that I'm able to have a credit card to help me with the things I need like emergencies, Wells Fargo and God helped me to be able to do that

name: dominguezm288
review: Portfolio Recovery Associates, LLC is a corporation that Wells Fargo works with. Good luck if you value integrity or have any standards for the type of companies you think such a well established corporation such as Wells Fargo would work with.

name: Lori
review: This is an ok card for cashback but the limit is really low and they do not seem to review for increases that often.  There are other cards out there with better options.

name: Angela
review: Secured card at $300, no auto conversion to a regular car.  Requires a hard pull to upgrade to a non secured card . Worthless card after 3 years.

name: Gene Johnson
review: DO NOT BANK HERE. I am yelling it from the Roof Top. STAY AWAY. YOUR MONEY IS PROBABLY SAFER UNDER YOUR BED.I could have given them ZERO stars if that choice was available. I banked here for 21 years which was the greatest mistake ever but it's finally time to move on. Rude customer service personnel. Incompetent Fraud department. Improper handling of the routine service. Even my contact with their Executive office was pitiful. I don't know if their staff get any training in customer service. I have a relationship with other banks and the difference is clear. Wells Fargo will always be in the "small league" when it comes to how their customers are treated. I had apparent fraud happen on one of my "minor's" accounts with Wells Fargo and they still cannot get the story right despite over 8 hours of being on hold on their phone lines and about 3 hours of speaking with multiple individuals with peanut-sized brains.  Rather than address the problem at hand on the minor's account after close to 3 weeks of filling claims and Wells Fargo’s mismanaging affairs. The best Wells Fargo could do was to block my account in the 3rd week of their sitting idle on the job and locking me out of my funds. Again, it was not my account involved but I called Wells Fargo on my child's behalf. My account was never the issue and why my account is blocked because of event on another account, that beats me.  I am told I need to go into a branch to be identified like I am the criminal when I am the victim. When you have Fraud occur on your Wells Fargo account, their first action is to victimize you all over again. Over a decade ago, my entire paycheck drove out of my account, Wells Fargo Mismanaged that too. I was told that I was responsible for the apparent fraudulent charges following Wells Fargo. It took 2 months for them to reset their brain and do the right thing. I CANNOT EVEN GET AN APPOINTMENT AT A BRANCH LOCATION FOR SEVERAL DAYS. When I finally make it into a banking location it will be to sever ties with this Bank that cares nothing about their customers.

name: nathandthomas
review: This corporate bank manipulates charges on accounts by holding charges for an extended time until the correct algorithm overdrafts customer accounts and they are freely "able" to charge the account. I have had transactions completed only to revert to processing again, and I am not just referencing one or two here and there. There has been an instance or two where a minimum of eight completed transactions went back to processing after becoming a posted and "completed" charge. And was soon, comically almost immediately charged and overdrafts fee. Stay away from these crooks, I'm only still a customer in hopes that I have enough built up evidence that I can win a class action against them.

name: Crystal
review: Great card for rebuilding credit. Plan on raising limit soon to building more credit to purchase home by the end of the year. Thanks

name: Shelia H
review: I have a $1,000 credit card limit which is unsecured at a low interest rate. I love doing business with Wells Fargo, and it is my bank of choice.

name: David
review: Terrible Lender my advice to people that looking for a home mortgage lender don't trust Wells Fargo they are known to rip customers off. They started out years ago as a high risk lender selling car loans

name: detballer
review: Terrible bank. In the middle of a global pandemic they have been ruthless with overdraft fees. My account went negative overnight. I deposited money first thing in the morning, and they still charged. Truly a terrible company. Their app is also updated and is now getting features that other bank apps had 2 or 3 years ago.

name: Joe Kennedy
review: I have a Wells Fargo Home Projects card. I was just hit with a $3,000 interest charged purchases after having the card for 18 months. This is ridiculous, I was led to believe I would start paying interest after 18 months, but $3,000? What a a rip off!!!!!!!

name: Rhonda Alm
review: I would give no stars but that’s not possible! Do not give them ur $! Worst bank ever. They let u think u have $, then reverse it!

name: William
review: No issues, they are reasonable to work with. No complaints, although all my payments were on time so I didn't speak with them much.

name: Laura Tomasetti
review: If I could leave no stars, I would. Customer service is AWFUL. I will never do business with Wells Fargo again. I bought my furniture through Ashley's and this is the said excuse of a bank they choose to do business with. If it wasn't for furniture taking 4+ months, I would return it and get it from somewhere else that doesn't deal with this bank. I had my payments taken out through my bank on 12/10. Due to the holidays and COVID my payment didn't get to you until 12/26. I have NEVER had a late payment, ANYWHERE. I called to see if there was something that could be done and "due to federal law (which is bs), nothing can be done. If I do for you, we have to do for every one." That's BULL. I work in customer service as well, and we WAIVE late fees ALL THE TIME. What is $15 to a big company like this one? It's a drop in the bucket. I am brand new to using online bill pay and have yet to have a problem with it. None of my other bills were late, so I don't know what happened with this one. Either way, it's absolutely RIDICULOUS that they refuse to waive $15. Also, they need to take a class on empathy because the representatives have NONE. Dry and monotone, especially Alex, who is a manager. I have never been so displeased in my life with a company. 10/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

name: yvodaj
review: No way on God's green earth would a rational person bank with Wells Fargo after reading the reviews. No doubt the complaints are real but every indication suggests that the the 5 star reviews are as fraudulent as the bank itself. They are filled with words like "INCREDIBLE" "OUTSTANDING" "AMAZING" along with plenty of !!!!'s. If you want money from them they probably  pay well for 5 star reviews because no one is going to do it for free.

name: Nerminseliman Seliman
review: Useless bank. Everything is going wrong. Too complicated for nothing. My advice to anyone: never think to work with WF. Your life will be sadness.

name: Peter Gratzer
review: Let me just start by saying my wife is an accountant and owns her firm. I have a good paying job as well. We got a loan through WF for an infrared sauna we purchased. We got the first bill yesterday and today they called looking for payment. My wife told them that we just got the bill. They said that was the second bill and we needed to get caught up. So we paid for both bills, which was fine. I logged in and saw they charged a late fee which is understandable. I called to have it removed because we never received the first bill, and they refused to remove it. Never again will I bank with WF, stealing money right out of my pocket. I will pay this loan off ASAP MAKING sure they make as little interest as possible. Extremely dissatisfied with customer service.

name: Mary
review: One of the best cards I could have ever had.. Running low on cash helps me tremendously I am purchasing land for solar panels and it’s great for small supplies .. Always pay it in full and I have had it come to my rescue many years... Thank you WF

name: sarabilyak
review: Before he passed, my father set up an educational account for my daughter. Now that he is gone, we have tried for 7 YEARS to access this account to no avail. They also have another $1000 of his money in an account that we cannot access even though WF certified my brother and I as trustees pursuant to our father's will. Now WF has forced my daughter to open a WF account to get a medallion signature to prove her identity and now they won't even give her the signature until she has been a WF customer for 2 months. DUDE, SHE HAS BEEN A CUSTOMER SINCE THIS ACCOUNT WAS CREATED IN 2013 AND YOU ARE HOLDING HER FUNDS HOSTAGE. CRIMINAL ACTIVITY AFOOT!

name: Cheryl Unknown
review: I have had a business account with this bank for 15 years. I went to deposit a check (FROM THE STATE OF NJ TREASURY) made out to my business and they would not accept the deposit. Stating that was not the name on the account. I set up an LLC under my last name and then another DBA with the company's name. I have deposited checks under both names legally for 15 years but this one day was different. I was told I had to call the inside of the bank and talk with a banker....in which I did. Anita told me that I would have to schedule an appointment and bring something that could verify my business as she could not help me. I jumped through all their hoops and finally a few days later got an appointment with Phil. Phil was 25 minutes late for our appointment with no apologies. I explained what happened...and provided him with my State of NJ business registration, Operation legal paperwork and my Official EIN paperwork from the government. He said he could not accept any of it!!! What is funny is I have a commercial loan with Wells Fargo in the name the company they are refusing to deposit a check that was written out to! What made matters worse is how Phil treated me in his office. He spoke down to me and was very curt. I initially gave him two proof of identities....and when he said he could not take them I asked him what else he needed. His reply was a business registration but when I provided that he got off the phone and said that was not good enough either. I asked him how I could have deposited hundreds of thousands of dollars into this bank and this was the first time a check was refused. He had a scowl on his face and said, "I don't know what to tell you". His handling of this situation and how he spoke to me was not professional ..I felt the issue was more of an inconvenience to him. After my treatment, the first 5 minutes, I turned on my phone recorder ......and at the end I told him about. He pointed to the door and asked me to leave. I asked him to clarify what he had said to me but he refused once he was aware of being recorded. I welcome a Wells Fargo to contact me for this recording as I am sure you would be interested in how your employees are treating your customers after a 15-year relationship. I NEVER had this experience with anyone else (the tellers are always so kind and helpful) so I am sure this was an isolated case but nonetheless it left a bad taste in my mouth. Update: I took the check to another Wells Fargo branch to deposit and they had no problem making that deposit for me. So it appears that the Branch on Lakewood Rd in Toms River was just giving me a hard time like I had thought.

name: Keith
review: I have been a valued customer for more than 15 years and still waiting for and upgrade to a better interest rate. Still waiting for you

name: Graylin
review: Always paid on time or early. This was my mortgage loan for the home I live in that was located in Gallatin,Tn   My wife decided to divorce me and convinced the judge to make me stop paying the monthly payment do we could ‘short sell’ which her attorney advised her to do knowing she was gonna file for bankruptcy

name: Katherine Denise
review: Excellent Company to do business with I plan to recommend this company to Everyone And Some day do Business with them Again I Found this to be very Professional.

name: dsimmonsbar7
review: This is the worst bank I have ever banked with and will not recommend anyone with a business or account there the customer service sucks and the reps lie to you to get your business and overall i would give them a big FAT 0

name: Nerminseliman Seliman
review:
That's true 
It's the worst bank

name: nancy_511616
review: We have been Wells Fargo customers for over 40 years a small 9 person office , we have had a bond with a vendor through for all that time. This year the only way we can get it is by putting the whole amount of the bond in an account and then giving them 400.00. Today I went in to get our Daily calendar and were told that they were not getting them. Seem to be a bank now only for big companies. Still good people on the teller window, but over all no banking relationships or service

name: Dean
review: I always pay as I charge. This card only allows a few payments a month online. Other than that I don't think I will use it much. I would give it a C. They gave me such a low line to start why even bother

name: Chris
review: Wellls Fargo has never sold my loan or really had any reason to contact me too much. One thing though is that I wish to do a cash out refi as they are my loan originator and as a bank during Corona 19 dates they were one of the first to stop doing them. During a time when rates couldn’t be lower, it makes it a little irritating. Let’s not forget the fraudulent lawsuits that plagued them as well.  Business is business right?

name: jamesbondgoff
review: We've contacted Customer Service via chat room several times, don't waste your time, it's a joke. They only know very basics, we've called Customer Service three times now, twice by me once by my wife and none of them gave the same info to which to help. I applied online for a balance transfer, received the cards in mail then two weeks look later received letter stating processing error, not declined due to credit or amount for transfer, this is when we called. Never in all credit card accounts (several) have I ever had this big of an issue talking to Customer Service, In my opinion DO NOT do business with Wells Fargo

name: Zachery
review: Decent card.... Don’t expect something great from a standard Wells Fargo credit card..... They’re debit cards are great though.....

name: torberi
review: Dear Wells Fargo, I wanted very much to be part of you customers family. I tried hard, with patience and persistence. We wanted to open business checking account. We drown in bureaucracy, wall of misunderstanding, unwilling to think and lack of common sense. In XXI century we could not fined communication tools?! I gave up. Good Luck for your customers and Merry Christmas!

name: Mark
review: Wells Fargo has been great to work with. And I ran into problems I did tell him I would pay this off and do not cancel this account and they gave me a chance and then two days I will pay this account off and it will have a zero balance. Thank you for keeping your word Wells Fargo

name: sandyvalente4
review: This is the worst bank I have ever used.  I had 4 overdrafts, which they took $35 each for.  No problem.   They then held my $1500 check for ten days.  This is the only income I have coming in.  I am a retired 71 old lady.  I called and begged, my rent was due, I need food, I do not drive.  They refused to help in any way.  Yes, I was over-drawn, but they took those over-drafts as soon as my check hit the bank, but would not release the rest of my money. I heard, " I am sorry" so many times, but they were not sorry enough to give me my money.  It was my money not the banks.  I have been banking there for over 10 years, depositing the same $1500 check each month. I spoke to about 10 different people, and even the Vice President of Wells Fargo.  I know they could have reversed the hold. I guess they decided people are just a bank number.  I can only hope this does not happen to any of their family members, but I am sure they would reverse this if my nam

name: Nerminseliman Seliman
review:
I completely agree with you
The same thing happened with me ,
My money holded for nothing
And I couldn't book a flight ticket for emergency situation

name: John Tian
review: Wells Fargo has been nothing but a headache. They told me 10 months after I opened my account that there was an issue with my social security number. I went into the local branch right away, provided my passport, social security card, and state issued drivers license (all of which they took photo copies of). They told me that for the last 10 months, my credit was not being reported, even though I had a credit card with them. Although I was upset it took them 10 months to verify my identity, I had some sympathy since I must have provided a wrong digit while I was opening my account. A month later, I'm at the grocery store, and my card is declined. I check my wells fargo app to find out that they closed my checking account without telling me. There was no communication, phone call, email, or voicemail that they would close it. I called customer service, and they could not find any information as to why my account was closed, except that they couldn't verify my identity. They said all the details are hidden in their system, and only the local branch can see them. I referred to a previous case ID regarding the first situation with my credit card, to which I was supposed to receive a resolution, or be contacted that the process is taking longer, a month ago (I had not received either). Customer service could not see any of the information, refused to contact the case specialist who was working on my case, and suggested that I open up another case. They told me a cashiers check would be mailed to me in 1-3 business days, with instructions on opening a new account with Wells Fargo. Long story short, I opened an account with this bank a year ago, and gave them the benefit of the doubt despite their past sketchy behaviors as a bank. I've never had any issues with any other bank, acorns, or investing accounts in terms of my identification. The bank has yet to provide me with a clear explanation, deflects the situation and blame, failed miserably with communication, and has wronged me as a customer one too many times. I feel as if I cannot trust a single individual in this organization. Their practice is unbelievably sketchy for an institution of their size. I asked the customer service that since they could not see any information of my account or ask the specialist who is working on my case to reach out to me, if they were there purely as customer de-escalation with no access to information----- to which they responded: yes. Do not trust this bank.

name: bair_sourcing
review: Our local Wells Fargo was extremely helpful.  Even during Covid.  The bank manager Casey Walthall was friendly and completed the needed tasks and more.  We really appreciated her going above and beyond to help us on Saturday.Thanks Casey!

name: Alan
review: Works fine for what I need. It’s a Kirkland credit card. Get Bill, easy to pay. No problems with it. Everything great. We don’t use it a lot, but get discount for using it.

name: Anita
review: Bless wells Fargo. I've been with them for several years and never have i walked into a branch that I wasn't greeted with a kind smile and quick help

name: Abduselam
review: Wells Fargo Home Loan have the best customer service. I have been with them for the last 14 years or so and then never disappointed me. Great

name: Lisa Lynn
review: Wells Fargo don’t EVER have to worry about me doing business with them ever again!!! They DO NOT want you to pay your mortgage off early. I went yesterday to ask if I could come back with my checkbook and was told yes. I went back today and was told by another employee that I could not pay at the branch. I was told that a check had to be mailed in or I could call. When I asked for the number, I was told to have a seat, 2 people in front of me. I’m thinking, you can’t even give me a number? He was the door greeter! I went home and decided to call and was given the run-around again on the phone... Really? I kept calling back to get somebody that possibility knew something. I finally spoke with a young lady named Ashley, (wish I’d asked her last name). Ashley was courteous, professional and most of all helpful. She took my payment and I am now a proud homeowner . I was so happy, I almost asked her for her Cash App to send her a bonus!

name: eadkins019
review: I have a Checking and Savings account with Wells Fargo! I absolutely love them! Such a phenomenal bank. People keep talking about the scandal but NONE of my money went missing NONE! 24/7 customer service is phenomenal NO questions! My money is SAFE & SECURE! Banks are very convenient and the mobile app is awesome as well. They deserve 5 stars from me! Keep up the good work.

name: paulhemmers01
review: Hold multiple accounts from day one in Florida, post Wachovia customer. Today business account is fraudulently empty. Called fraud dept to get 2 to 10 days of money back in my account. I calked to try to get provisional money just be put on hold 3 hours. Terrible.

name: atabularasa
review: I've been in the process of refinancing now for several months. All I get is the new date? We need more of the same information you already gave, and no one has any answers other than the scripted replies. I don't know about all of Wells Fargo but I can tell you the Salem Oregon branch is the worst, the incompetence from the first person you meet all the way up to the management. I should have gone with one of the other available banks in my area but I thought after 20 plus years of being a customer I would have been treated with a little bit more respect and privacy.

name: GREGORY Southerland
review: Excellent Interest rate. There was a auto pay clause that gave a reduced interest rate. It helped rebuild my credit. Started with a 600 when they gave me the loan, I now have a 720. It also helped me get approved for the Propel card. It was a flawless process from beginning to end

name: CHARLES
review: This bank is wonderful, They help me build up my credit and increased my credit limit. I am really grateful. I strongly recommend this bank to anyone.

name: Malissa
review: 3 years same credit card..almost 700 rating..and was denied an increase. Have more than doubled limit on other cards. Not customer friendly at all.

name: Christopher
review: I had a credit limit of 3600 dollars and I was late a few days on a payment and without letting me know anything they lowered my credit to $300. This is after several years of never having a late payment .It let me know that they do not care about their customers.

name: Nolan
review: Never had a problem dealing with Wells Fargo.  Easy to deal with and get documents on a timely manner. Low easy payment and easy to make addional payments.

name: Lionel
review: It’s an okay card to start with. Don’t really get any points etc. It’s just a credit that I use to use but other than that nothing too special

name: FRANK R
review: 1 of my 1st cards. Basically a higher APR card of the bunch. Somewhat of a nice looking plastic card in the group. A NO frills card. Don't expect any bonus points or cash back. Lives in my wallet for looks ONLY.  Decent starting limit over $5k. Ymmv.

name: kaylie xue
review: worst customer service experience ever . They will transfer you out to a unrelated department or hang up the phone if they dont know the answer .

name: keakea206
review: Worst bank dont reccomend theres a reason there on Netflix for the most corrupt bank how do I get charged over draft fee for checks when my acct canr even have checks and no one can explain

name: media_research_djl
review: Never, ever, ever, ever bank with Wells Fargo. Seriously, if you're even considering opening an account with Wells Fargo, my advice would be to run in the opposite direction as fast as you can. My partner and I recently used Wells Fargo as the mortgage lender for our first home. We had read the bad reviews. We knew they had an "F" rating from the Better Business Bureau. We saw there were over 40,000 complaints about them to the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau in the past 5 years. But they offered us a low rate and seemed friendly during the initial calls, so we figured it couldn't be that bad. Boy were we wrong. In brief, Wells Fargo made an error and failed to release a federally-required document (“Closing Disclosures”) three days before our closing date. They claimed to need price details from the title company, but the title company had provided those details weeks in advance – in fact, we have the email chain where Wells Fargo confirmed receipt of the information. Regardless, Wells Fargo didn’t tell any of the parties involved that they were “missing fees” until 12 HOURS before our scheduled close time. This error caused serious financial and psychological distress because we had to leave our apartment the day after our original closing date. Instead of moving in as planned, we had to:1) Pay the moving company to deliver our belongings to storage2) Pay for storage over a holiday weekend3) Pay for a second move from the storage company to our new home after closing4) Board our pet 5) Find lodging during COVID-19 with 12 hours noticeWells Fargo's negligence quite literally rendered us homeless. As if that weren’t bad enough, they have been downright hostile to us since closing. When we asked Wells Fargo to reimburse us for the financial struggle they caused, they pointed fingers, displaced blame, engaged in blatant gaslighting, and refused to admit wrongdoing. Over a dozen calls to our case manager at the Wells Fargo Executive Complaint Office went unreturned. Since the deal is done and Wells Fargo has already made their money, they appear to have no interest in correcting their mistake. I’m shocked and disgusted that Wells Fargo is still allowed to operate given the scandals it’s been involved with over the past decade. I urge you, for your own good, DO NOT bank with them. Learn from our story and the tens of thousands of others who filed complaints with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau. Don’t let your personal bank account become collateral damage to corrupt corporate greed.

name: Paul
review: Wells Fargo is awful stay away from them at all costs. I also hate places that ask me for reviews and then won't allow me to just leave a short one you have to put in a hundred and thirty characters

name: Adrian
review: They’ve been awesome I have not had any problems. I have 0% for 15 mos so i took advantage of it. I have had the card a little over a year so far

name: Bradley
review: Card is very conservative and does not allow credit line increases very often (ie: once in 7 years).  There are many great security features and when used with the WF app it's quite convenient to to access.

name: Kathleen
review: Convenient - use anywhere - rewards to cash - have savings, mortgage & checking with the same bank.  Located close to home - know most employees

name: Gregory
review: Thank you for the opportunity and my home loan to be able to get my interest rates down and to be able to save money during the year is my main goal

name: Shelia
review: Bank excellent service inside and out always willing to help you have the best experience. During the difficult pandemic days they have been quick to help on the phone. They have offered assistance if your income was affected by COVID-19.

name: commute95
review: I receive a threatening letter every 6 months that I am behind in my home equity payment. I have never missed a payment. Finally escalated to exrcutive office. They told me I need to talk to customer service. Ms. Mirrusxand Ms. Green in the Executive office is a disgrace.

name: Adrian Waller
review: Wells Fargo closed all of our accounts with only a letter saying "It is a business decision."  We are a non-profit, helping the poor in northern Mexico, with housing, medical, and educational needs.  We have more than $500,000 in cash in the bank.  What is it Wells Fargo, you don't want non-profits to help the poor?   Terrible customer relations after being there for 24 years.   Do not bank with them.

name: Katie
review: I love Wells Fargo customer service, other banks should take notice and learn what customer service is. Keep up the good work Well Fargo.

name: Katie
review: They have helped so much with home loan since Corvid - 19 they care about their customers and know where their bread is buttered from.

name: Rashed

name: donald
review: Thank you for all your efforts in trying to make sure i get the best deals they have on the market. I feel like i have a friend in the credit world

name: Oran
review: I guess if I had to choose a lender that provided flexible repayment options, I found one in AES. I would not hesitate to recommend them to other WalletHub members.

name: nelsona_17
review: For some reason I went ahead and tried it out despite all the bad reviews and my acct was switched to an unsecured card after 6 months. My initial investment into the card was $300 and they gave the $300 back immediately after they switched me to unsecured.

name: Andrew
review: They dont care about their customers. no matter what. incompetent service. expensive products. They don't care how long you had them.

name: Dean
review: Impossibly inept online services. No capacity to handle US citizens serving overseas. Useless and unreachable online services. Incremental increases in mortgage payments due to various “fees”. Horrible.

name: Paul
review: Been with wells Fargo for over 40 years have had no problems with them over those years always have been very helpful on the phone and online very happy with them,

name: Ronnie
review: They were easy to work with and all paperwork were filed over the computer. It wAs difficult to reaching someone if you had question about your loan.

name: Gabriel
review: They put an incorrect late payment on my credit and they were supposed to remove it but didn’t. They tried to charge me late fees that weren’t accurate.

name: Carlos Sirias
review: HORRIBLE STORY, THEY NEED TO CHANGE THERE NAME TO RIPOFF WELLS FARGO. ON OCT/26/2020 it was PANIC, SUPRISE after I open the app in my account from wells Fargo with NO warning ⚠️ They draft $3,000 dollars my ONLY SAVINGA. Due to Covid-19 epidemic I'm not working I have not been working since March 2020. 2 years ago I had my Identity stolen, I report it to Wells Fargo, IRS and credit bureau. Since then I had a credit card from Wells Fargo and I Mentioned Them that there was some transaction that wasn't mine, They pursue me to pay the whole total amount. I Have two different mortgages.
