IF ANY BODY KNOW AN ATTORNEY TO PURSUE WITH A CLASS ACTION LAWSUIT PLEAS LET ME NOW. because I want to be right there with them. They have no heart, they have no compassion and you can go into one of their Banks every day and they still won't remember you, and no one know anything. I want my money released to me. Carlos Sirias

name: KIMBERLY ANDERSON
review: This is regarding their bill pay. My landlord did not get his rent check till 18 days later and they will not send him the late fee because rent was due on the 1st and I had it set to the 5th. I got a late fee after the 5th and they said it does not fall with in their guidelines because rent was due on the 1st. Makes no sense since it was still 18 days late. I should have took warnings from friends and not of banked with wells fargo. Initially, I spent 1.5 hours on the phone with them about them cancelling the check and I spoke with 5 people who all gave me different answers. Does it really take 1.5 hours to stop a payment on a check?

name: hollandknightdaughter
review: I cannot express how much I hate Wells Fargo. It is so ridiculous that they are holding my money for 10 days when it's so easy to confirm plus they lost a check for $3,000. With times like these people are barely making it and because of this stupid Bank I have $6,000 and yet I cannot even save my own truck. I pray that there is another class action lawsuit because I want to be right there with them. They have no heart, they have no compassion and you can go into one of their Banks 50 times a day and they still won't remember you. I want my money released to me and I will put it on Yelp Google the Ripoff Report anywhere I can post about this horrible Bank

name: Joyce Dobisch
review: STAY FAR AWAY FROM WELLS FARGO HOME MORTGAGE! They are dishonest and corrupt. Avoid phone calls with employees and get all correspondence in writing, as there is no honor system at Wells Fargo. I found the employees at WF, especially the executives, lied every time I spoke with any of them by phone. The lies constantly changed, in order to fit the story they were trying to peddle. They put me on payment suspension, even though I didn't want it, didn't need it, haven't suffered a Covid-19 hardship, and haven't missed a payment. Stated on the Wells Fargo website is the following: "a customer can end payment suspension at any time." That statement is a LIE because I've repeatedly requested to be removed and they still haven't done it. A few days ago I received  an email from WF informing me it would take weeks for them to review my case.In addition, I have found that my mortgage statements are not transparent, nor are they accurate. Wells Fargo has devised their own questionable and obscure accounting system. I found payments I had made that were not applied to my account.  Instead, the same amount of these unapplied payments were listed as an "overdue amount to be paid in order to make the account current." This is ridiculous and completely unacceptable. Mortgage statements should be accurate at all times. Payments should be applied. No customer should have to file complaints and post negative reviews in order to get an inaccurate statement corrected. But that is exactly what I've had to do. They only response I've received from Wells Fargo is that they again need weeks to review the case. Wells Fargo is the epitome of corruption. There are numerous complaints and negative reviews posted online about Wells Fargo. Read them and BEWARE!

name: datlas97
review: Wells recently instituted a $10/mo fee per account unless you meet some stringent requirements.  I can meet them all, but why would I pay $10/mo against a 0.01% interest rate? When I sent a letter of complaint to the Sr VP for Consumer Affairs the response was, "Well, we have a no frills $5.00/mo account". So, Ally now gets all my business.  Yes, they're online, but they make it easy to get your money when you need it, and a live, polite person answers the phone 24 hr/day.  I'll be at my branch ripping my money out of WF hands this week.

name: Wilbert Calderon
review: No used bank Wells Fargo. My ex boyfriend got steal. Can my bank is cancel. Long time. I never my bank Wells Fargo. Pls stop send me

name: Eche
review: The best mortgage experience. Walked me through from beginning to closing. With definitely finance my next home and vehicle through them.

name: Julie L Russell
review: Require more paperwork then other banks (and impossible to get because of covid). I believe they are doing it just to change fees.  Refuse to give out email of fax to complain to higher ups

name: Kenneth
review: So far, this card is everything I hoped it would be and more. This helped me through difficult times financially. I’m very appreciative of the credit limit extended to me as a user and hope to prove myself more worthy in the future to a higher limit

name: PJ JOHNS
review: While observing appointments and walk-ins being serviced first... I waited/standing for over 1 hour... at age 70...logged into their system...UNSEEN at "Arrowhead" 75th Ave and Bell Rd. After being referred to this long distant drive to this Arrowhead Location by another WF branch in Phx. to get 1 mtg question answered because the phone service for the Mtg. Dept. is even worse.. I will be taking my banking else where... A valued Customer for over 25 yrs...checking...savings...refinancing...a current home owner who paid off loan with WF home mtg recently...Yes I am a person of "COLOR"

name: Carl
review: Wells Fargo credit card plus With 3500 Credit limit just build my credit it is not a card I’m Planning to keep in the future interest rate is too high

name: burnham2013
review: Slow to non exsistant help. Very bad customer client retention. Would not consider doing business with this organization again. They can use an infusion of new ideas and processing.

name: ruzzoal25
review: Wells Fargo is the worst bank in the world!  I have had an account with them for 25 years (shame on me) and was in a constant fight with them.  The last straw was that they screwed me out of $8,000!  No joke. I fought and fought with them and their final word was, "Sorry, you are SOL!  Ha! Ha!"

name: Craig Witcher
review: I have been with Wells Fargo for 25 years. Yet. I am always at odds with them over how they do things and how they charge fees. Tonight was the last straw. I will be closing my account. I ask everyone to close their accounts with Wells Fargo. If we all close our accounts, they will have to change. Otherwise, they will never change .Close your account at Wells Fargo.

name: ruzzoal25
review: Amen, Craig Witcher!  I also have been with Wells Fargo for 25 years, shame on me.  I was always in a fight with them.  The last straw was that they screwed me out of $8,000!  Yes, true story but too detailed to go into.  I am closing all of my accounts.

name: txashdiane
review: WELLS FARGO=THIEVES!!! (And their customer service dept. Is a joke)

name: James
review: They don’t offer me anything, cash back, miles, nothing so I only rate them a 3 out of a possible 5. This is crazy especially given that my FICO SCORE with WFB is 825

name: Sheikh
review: Hello it’s a great bank some one can trust for many reasons like banking services and Cerdit card interest and loans interest are great thx for Wellsfargo

name: bunnymoon63
review: Called 3 business days ahead to stop payment on a recurring account. WF rep said it was taken care of, no problem. Now they're charging me back $580. Creating false accounts, charging auto loan borrowers for insurance that they already had, bilking homeowners. Now racist remarks from the CEO. How is this bank still in business? Wells Fargo is the epitome of everything wrong in this country!

name: Caryin
review: Wells Fargo is the Best Bank I have Found. CUSTOMER SERVICE is Above and Beyond, When I need Help on Anything they Are there. Wish I had found them sooner. I Highly Recommend Them. Anyone I know that is having problems with their Bank. I tell them to walk in and just talk to anyone in the Branch They will be glad they did.

name: Jay Are
review: Wells Fargo is a garbage company with significantly below average customer service, policies, employees, and values. I would rather sit in a cage with starved tigers before every opening an account with them again. I wish I listened to reviews. Please stay far far far away. Apply for every single credit card before even slightly considering giving them your business.

name: Karla
review: My payments are always on time.  I stay on top of al my accounts and pay more than the minimum asked.  Requesting to take that under consideration

name: Lori
review: love wells fargo!  they have amazing customer service is ever you need them on their credit cards for fraud, disputes or just any reason.

name: romanmcgeachy
review: The absolute Worst bank ever called in to dispute charges made by Exwife and boyfriend after she wouldn’t return my bank cards and they basically told me suck it up we ain’t doing nothing after wasting my time and life.

name: Lashawna H
review: Flexible, great customer service and easy to work with regarding payments. No hassle and no surprises when it comes to your charges

name: James
review: Lousy customer service. Reported 30 day late to credit bureaus because they were too slow in approving forbearance . Can’t wait to get rid of them as well

name: marcosbullon35
review: These people are thieves. I lost my card someone found it and used it. Wells Fargo did not recognized my claim. I lost money with them.

name: Christie C
review: I asked for deferrment agreement. They reported card payment lat. Not cool.

name: rjfeim
review: No Customer Service.  Don't answer the telephone number listed on their web page.  No 'Chat' feature. Website does not allow you to login to make credit card payment which ruins your credit score unless you physically drive to a facility...only to find that the doors are locked.

name: Dl
review: I got this card for promo 0% interest for 12 months and barely use since I get no rewards.  I do like the cell phone protection but that is about it for this card otherwise useless.

name: bruce_holland
review: On April 23, 2020 I received a letter from Wells Fargo with the Subject line "You Have Payment Suspension For This Account". After speaking with Wells Fargo I was informed I would be receiving a 3 Month Forbearance with payments to resume in August, further stating the 3 missed payments would be added to the end of the loan. In August when I resumed making payments I was informed by Wells Fargo I would need to make all 3 missed payments to bring the account current. After speaking with Stephanie Perez (Case Specialist) she stated because I have a VA Loan Wells Fargo would have to first get approval from the VA to have the payments added to the end of the loan. I tried to explain No One stated that to me and it was never placed in any correspondence I received from Wells Fargo. It seems Wells Fargo is engaged in very Misleading and Deceptive Practices targeting Military Families.

name: Paul
review: Had same credit line for 22 years payments always been on time. Good thing other credit cards are out there with high credit line.

name: karenc_136
review: It's been 2 months and Counting just to get a lien release they have lied to me 4 Separate occasions saying that they FedEx it out when they did not then transfer to escalation Department twice Title Company several times bankruptcy several times then back to a supervisor who did nothing but ignore my phone calls when I was told he was waiting to be transferred went to court again and still no paperwork there's no way in hell I would ever hire this company to be my bank nothing but time wasted on phone for lies & corporate does nothing about it these people should not be in business very shady they could not even send me an email confirming what they were telling me

name: contactsylan
review: All I asked WF is to properly subtract my entire principal payment from the balance like they should have done on the date of payment. Wells Fargo is trying to commit fraud again! All I asked them to do was fix this so-called mistake and they refused. They just gave me the run around! No idea what they did????? All I know is WF is charging me interest on my incorrect balance!By accepting the principal payment and having it printed on the receipt, WF entered to an agreement to accept the principal payment! I should have been not been told it would go towards my balance if it was not going to be at the time of the deposit! Principal payments go directly towards the balance only, not interest!Principal payment is simple math. The entire principal is subtracted from the balance only! They do not need to contact me to confuse the situation or try and convince me what they did is correct! This is not the first time Wells Fargo has done questionable activities, in fact there is a Netflix (Dirty Money) special just on Wells Fargo illegal activities. This is why they have commercials that state: earning your trust back.... Now the question is how many customers is Wells Fargo doing creative accounting on?

name: Stacy Maxwell
review: I was dealing with some legal issues at my local branch at Wells Fargo. My banker had repeatedly called the main headquarters to no avail and we were at a standstill. I went home and called the main headquarters myself. I was fortunate to connect with Deidra Sumter. She was compassionate, kind, knowledgeable and went above and beyond and found the answers and resolved the problem. I called my banker and he said he was still resolving the problem. I informed him that it was resolved, thanks to Deidra.  She's the best!

name: CHARLES
review: Great bank to have a credit card.  Any over drafts are applied to your card first before they are debited from your account.  Every once in awhile  there would be an over-draft charge that shows up -  Especially after a weekend full of  large and frequent spending.

name: lindaj_82
review: My house note is always paid on time because i have it drafted from my account every month. I have a great rating with my mortgage company.

name: Melissa
review: I paid off my higher interest rate home loan with this Wells Fargo Credit Line through my employer @a much lower rate.  My payments vary through the life of the loan.

name: Melissa
review: I purchased a bass boat for my son and co signed this loan as a credit starter loan. Wells Fargo is my employer and obviously gave me the employee discount rate. Great employer!

name: KaSonya
review: The wells Fargo secured credit card has been helpful to help with my credit; however,  I only have a 300.00 limit for the past 5 years and I always pay on time.

name: Tammy
review: I enjoy banking with Wells Fargo. I have been a Customer for almost 30 years. I plan to continue  doing business and banking with Wells Fargo.

name: Cliff
review: Cash rewards (must be) built up to a full ($25.00) before cardholders can redeem their earned rewards. My (cash wise) rewards have (stalled) at ($22.00) because i fail to use the card more frequently. I've earned these rewards but i have been penalized... All of my other (cashback) credit cards have no (minimum redemption threshold). This wells fargo (cash wise) credit card has a unreasonable ($25.00 minimum redemption threshold).

name: Sonja
review: Wells Fargo has saved me from losing  my home and becoming homeless over a long period of time due to unemployment.  Customer service has been understanding, compassionate, kind, and worked 100% towards keeping me in my home.  Thank you Wells Fargo!!!!

name: Victoria Distor
review: I canot access my account but they are convinced that imtrying to defraud them and wont let me update my info or access account online with a new password.I have a mortgage with them as well...same status

name: Sarah
review: Was my first credit card and I love it! Helped me build my credit and doesn’t have a high monthly payment even when I’ve almost maxed it out. If I’ve had any fraud on my card Wells Fargo is quickly on it to fix that problem.

name: JJ Sarnrankus
review: Wells Fargo enables criminals and CANNOT be trusted. In March 2020 two men came into my home and stole two unsigned, undated checks. I called Wells Fargo to cancel the checks, and they permitted the checks to get cashed. The criminals FORGED signatures and dates on the checks; after review, Wells Fargo then said that it stands by its decision because the checks were signed -- how does that make sense when the signatures were forged and clearly are different than the signatures supposedly retained on file?! The brilliant Wells Fargo rep who reviewed the case said that she wasn't aware that a request was input to cancel the checks -- so this shameless company fails to provide due diligence to protect its customers. This response took literally months to receive, yet they didn't even review the most basic elements of the case. Initially I was given an agent who never returned calls, only for me to later learn that Wells Fargo assigned the case to the wrong department. This company defines incompetence and borderline negligence in handling its customers finances. Meanwhile the police constitute this case as fraud and theft, but the folks of Wells Fargo permit this behavior. Wells Fargo is despicable, and I wouldn't trust it to keep a cactus alive, let alone protect my future finances.Customers should remove their money from this bank to keep it safe. It ha a history of screwing over people that runs so deep its taught at Harvard Law teaches about its infamous 2016 scandal of fake customer accounts, to present day cases of discrimination, and hitting its loyal customers with some of the highest banking fees out there.Avoid this bank like your money depends on it!Timeline of Scandals: https://finance.yahoo.com/news/wells-fargo-scandals-the-complete-timeline-141213414.htmlCostliest Bank Penalties (August 2020): https://finance.yahoo.com/news/wells-fargo-asset-cap-now-183607932.htmlDiscrimination: https://www.charlotteobserver.com/news/business/banking/article245233685.htmlSenators Demand Answers: https://www.nbcnews.com/business/economy/two-senators-demand-answers-wells-fargo-following-nbc-news-reports-n1235276 #cancelwellsfargo #wellsfargobreaks #wellsfargo

name: jsante161
review: Be careful when you get an offer to apply for this card, seems like they just want to obtain your credit report just to deny you after all. I have well established credit with high quality banks and credit union yet they denied my approval after an offer made by them,

name: lashawn
review: Not the best home loan service. Online mortgage app has very little information about your loan and you are unable to access your documents online. Never sent out offers/ incentives to lower your interest rate even when rates dropped. Offer nothing to loyal customers.

name: Edna
review: Very good card.  I don’t use it every day but it’s always accepted and the points are really good.  I also have a car Loan with them and can access everything easily

name: mdean6
review: Can't access online banking as I forgot password.  called - waited a long time for response - someone finally responded but their English was so poor I could not understand them.  This is just one example from this miserable bank.  I only remain with them because I was grandfathered in when they took over yet another small local bank.  Because of my age, I have a no-fee account grandfathered in which they twice tried to rescind (which would have been illegal. )  If you're searching for a bank, look for a different one.

name: Steven
review: Wells Fargo has been really good to work with. Getting started is a learning curve, but once you figure out their policies, they’re worthwhile.

name: John
review: Not excited about the credit limit they extended me.  I have a higher limit on every other card that I carry and low balances that are paid off monthly.  Will be taking advantage of the 18 month promo period and closing the card or putting it in the cabinet.

name: Charles
review: Beware: Wells Fargo Bankers do business just like loan sharks!  I went to another bank and got a loan to pay this one off, with a great savings!  I will never do business with Wells Fargo again!

name: Michael Meyers
review: Number one AAA security.  I received a text and an email regarding suspicion of fraudulent charges on my account.  The charges were declined pending my approval.  Since they were not mine, I called and the account was closed per my request and a new card was sent to me. Knowledgable CS reps who spoke plain English and quickly handled the case.

name: steven_chambless
review: Do not bank with Wells Fargo. My transaction should have been protected by one of these Two federal laws, the Mail, Internet or Telephone Order Merchandise Rule and the Fair Credit Billing Act.  These acts protect the consumer in which it offers "protections and procedures so you don't have to pay for merchandise you ordered but never got."I ordered something in which I did not receive.They do not care.help me make it right

name: christine kim
review: Wells Fargo is unreliable. I am very dissatisfied with how WF has dealt with my accounts. I had to cancel my cc because of a fraudulent transaction. I was sent my new card and was not given access on my online account. I called to get access and when I viewed my outstanding balance, my outstanding balance was far greater than the original balance I had with the fraudulent transaction and I hadn't used the new card after the initial canceling of the card. When I called again the bank was unable to send me my statement balance so I was transferred to another call with a banker who would send me my statement. I have been on the phone for over 3 hrs and got no where in terms of getting to even see my statement. There is something seriously wrong with WF. I recommend that you make no accounts with WF. I am extremely disappointed with the countless errors and issues I have had with WF. They were the first bank I opened with in college and now I wish I had known wiser that this bank is unreliable.

name: Darice Pacheco
review: The worst bank you can trust for your business.  Have no respect or loyalty to a business after a whole year of service. If I can rate 0 I will

name: Jonathan
review: The point system is Okay. It took me almost ten years in saving up for points in order for me to get what I wanted: a trip to Costa Rica. It was well worth the trip (hotel and airfare paid for by points), but for a period of 4 years in earning points, I was charging nearly $2,500 to my credit card.

name: Alvin
review: Bad customer service. Too many hidden fees. Doesn’t not help notify you if you have overcharge even though there is an option threat is on.

name: sybulldog
review: M y identity was stolen and used to set up a Wells Fargo account.  I have been trying to reach them for an update after reporting the Fraud two weeks ago.  I was hung up on three times by three different Wells Fargo reps while they were transferring me to someone else in the company.  They have the worst customer service and do not take Fraud very serious if the Wells Fargo Reps do not know how to help someone who does not have account with them but they can see the Fraud claim associated with my SS# all while feeling it's appropriate to hang up the phone.  When I finally was able to get someone to assist me on the fourth call there were no actions that had been made in two weeks by Wells Fargo.  Even an acknowledgement that Identity Fraud had been committed in writing is enough to start a local Police Report and they haven't even provided that.  I have now spent 2.5 hours on the phone talked with over a dozen Wells Fargo reps and have nothing but their word that they will call me within 24 hours.

name: Jacob
review: I’ve been loving it so far! Great card for beginners who have just gotten into the credit card game. I got this after a year with a college card and the rewards are great!

name: Joel Font
review: I have had several issues with Wells Fargo over the years and I try to avoid doing business with them because their customer service is horrible. Wells Fargo decided to merge the online bank accounts profile with the auto loan profile recently. Since then I have not been able to access my auto loan information. I have been to a branch, I have talked to customer service over the phone several times and they keep telling me they are sorry and that they try to resolve within the next 24 hours but nothing has been done. I have been dealing with this for a few weeks now and have spent countless hours on the phone.

name: bistromike
review: Best Customer service in Clark Nj 07066 BranchAlways very friendly and quick service very acomadting  always taking the xtra step to help me in my business also making good recommendations for all there personal and business sevices

name: Margaret
review: It would be nice if they report on time when your account is paid off. Since this affects your credit score. It should not take that long for  them to report it.

name: Susan Kirkpatrick
review: I married an abusive man. Wells Fargo gave him a loan against our mortgage using unfinished divorce papers!!! I did not sign for this loan. When I confronted Wells Fargo they told me I could go ahead and Perdue it but I was warned they have better lawyers!!! The bank is sexist and dangerous to it's costomers!! I had to swallow the gross injustice.

name: Victoria
review: I fell behind in my payments due to Covid 19. They told me I could submit partial payments, but now it shows in behind on payments?  I thought I would be safe from being behind since it was due to Covid 19. Thanks for letting me know about how I can fix this.

name: staceykisting
review: This is the worst experience I have ever had trying to get a credit card.  I have a credit score of over 800 and very good income.  This company denied me from the start. I have never been denied credit for anything. I've had to call everyday and go into the bank twice to bring documents to prove where I live and who I am.  Then they still denied me for insufficient income when that's not even an issue.  I don't have a high debt to income ratio, I do not have credit card balances, and if I do it's paid off before the next billing cycle. I have NEVER missed a payment or was late on anything in my life.  Very unfair practices. I will be reporting this company.

name: Lance E
review: Helped me consolidate a couple of bills and raised my credit profile a few points. Good product for those interested in a quick fix to balancing your budget.

name: Angela
review: This has been an excellent experience with building your credit. I have had this card for a year now with making on time/ before time payments . you, want received an increase unless you add more money to your card. However, you will receive your money back that you put on your card. This has allowed me to increase my credit score .

name: Amanda
review: I absolutely love Wells Fargo... they bend over backwards to help people, they are amazing... If you ever have a problem with a creditor or fraud they always take your side an support you

name: Brian E M
review: I swear, Wells has THE most Service Charges then any other credit card out there. Regardless of your Wells account transactions, Wells will tack on a service charge. And yes, I am switching to another financial institution for all my banking needs. I stick with them only for brand loyalty but enough is enough!

name: John
review: Was easy to open account when I bought new furniture.   The only issue is that Wells Fargo  customer service does know know how to answer questions about this type of account, and there is no way to ask for a credit limit increase.

name: tep_dianne
review: Worst bank ever.  Wells Fargo will do anything to make it impossible for you to get YOUR money.  HOURS on hold waiting for 'bankers' who are so inept at tech support you wonder who they are hiring.  No better in person with endless rules. I could go on and on.  After 7 years with Wells Fargo, I'm done.

name: Steve Howard
review: Wells Fargo made it impossible for our family to reach them so we could satisfy our mortgage while it was in Forebearance. As a result of Wells Fargo’s negligence, we were left with no choice but to pay the mortgage in full. We were never able to get them on the phone to setup a payment program like they promised. Instead we were forced to do what we had to do to ensure our credit rating didn’t take a hit.  Wells Fargo is continually in the news for bad ethics, this is just another example of an unchecked corporation that can do whatever it wants with no consequences.

name: CARMEN C Aguilar
review: So far no problems at all with this account, interest rate were kept and customer services answer my questions at all times. Online services good

name: Brooke
review: Wells Fargo adds almost 50% of your monthly payment back to the card once you make your payment if it's the minimum and before they report it to the bureaus. It's the only one I have that you have to make large payments to get ahead. I want to pay it off and be done.

name: Lindi
review: Customer service is excellent. The App is very easy to use. I have never had an issue with my accounts that couldn’t be resolved or explained

name: Jacqueline
review: Wells Fargo credit card services and rewards are good, however there un-timely manner to show what is current on an individual's card is super slow.  For example, I paid off the current balance at least 3 weeks or more ago and it still shows that I have an outstanding balance.  This is unacceptable, if you are the credit card company is going to promptly show a new increased balance such as this one, it should then promptly show that the balance is a lower amount or zero.

name: Kheam
review: My credit scores wasn’t the best, Most of credit companies like Discover and American Express dropped me like the world is about to end. I paid all of my balances off but they still dropped me. Only Wellsfargo gave me chance, and even gave a higher credit limits then other credit card companies. That shows that Wellsfargo cares about its customers. That means the world to me. Thank you so much for standing by me.

name: Hope
review: I have no intention's of sellimg my house ot is on forbarance but it's fanny Mae freddy mac loan so it will be deferd so I'm paying the estimate's that my taxes and home owner they are aware of this

name: Daniel
review: I enjoy having the Wells Fargo credit card as good backup that provides the same cash back option when I use their credit card as the Discover card does.

name: Samson
review: Great experience! Low rate, closing costs, smooth process. Never had an issue. Definitely going to refinance here when I am able to!

name: Christina
review: Easy loan to apply for, same day approval and next day funds. Easy and fast process and the reps I dealt with were pleasant and helpful.

name: William
review: Excellent company to do business with, highly recommend for those with good credit they have a zero intro rate for 15 months, can't beat that.

name: James
review: I am pleased with My Wells Fargo Home loan.  The statements are easy to read and I enjoy handling this account online which is a plus

name: nvt951
review: My experience with Wells Fargo Mortgage was terrible.Run. Do NOT apply.Application process went on for months. The loans are all sent to Oregon mortgage for processing. They are incompetent, arrogant, and waste your time.Working with Wells Fargo Mortgage was a complete waste of time!

review: No problems. Offered assistance during COVID. We accepted but did not like the information sent regarding the forbearance period and decided to cancel after 2 months and catch up on the mortgage. It was more comfortable to go another way.

name: Lindsey
review: Great in these times wonderful ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ if needed so 130 characters wow ok ok put on as authorization user

name: Cynthia
review: Great card to have. Started as a secured card, then was upgraded. Easy to manage. Good first card to learn and to establish your credit.

name: Jose
review: Wells Fargo is my bank and they don’t increase my line of credit, all my credit scores are above 745 and after over 2 years they declined a credit increase 3 times

name: Katie Connelly
review: Horrible experience.  Wanted to refinance a mortgage, but no confidence in Wells Fargo based on this experience with them.  They repeatedly asked for documentation that simply doesn't exist (like proof that we own a business... newsflash - we don't own a business!) and they also lost personal documentation that we'd sent over!   Expect to go weeks waiting to hear from them, expect massive overreach on the personal data they want, and expect lots of internal errors that you get to deal with.  Expect lots of apologies, but no ownership for their actions/mistakes.  Would leave 0 stars if possible.  Lots of headaches but feeling good about parting ways. Frankly, don't want to give them any more of my money.

name: Sharon
review: Love the card. Wish they reported credit balance changes more quickly as they report missed payments or derogatory information. Otherwise no issues

name: Jay Roth
review: Loan was handled by WF from conception to now owning the mortgage. People are friendly and knowledgeable. WF is also very advanced technically with great ease of use. Good choice for mortgages

name: Jason
review: Great card for rewards. I have other cards but I really love all the extras this card give me. I also had a dispute and it was an easy process to deal with.

name: socialworkmylife
review: This Card is helping me rebuild my credit- thank you I am learning so much from Wellsfargo Bank and my prepaid card I am truly appreciative

name: kendalequarles
review: Had a follow up call in regards to being racially profiled with the branch manager at Wells Fargo Bank on I-35 Parmer Austin Tx . The branch manager name is Laura , she was no help and pretty much defended her racist staff. I advise you to do business elsewhere, I was racially profile and disrespected by one of their tellers and the company and branch did nothing to resolve the issue. Let’s continue the peaceful protest, remember this was all over a withdrawal transaction. They claim my address wasn’t updated in their system , when I provided them proof of address they continue to profile me.Stay away, do business elsewhere!!!!!!

name: Zivahyah
review: The intro 0% APR is the best when you want to make a big purchase. When you bank with Wells Fargo it is also easy to pay the bill because unlike some other credit cards, you can pay more than the posted balance if you want.

name: Terrence
review: It was a secured credit card (my own money) that Wells Fargo suggested for me to open to help me improve my credit score, but I really didn't want to open one and for the most part I kept up with the monthly payments but later decided to close the account because they were charges that just didn't add up nor was it really helping me.

name: lauren12300
review: I just switched over to Wells Fargo a few months ago from another bank hoping that they would be better. I guess I was wrong because when the ATM took almost $300 from me and didn't credit it to my checking account but didn't give it back to me either, I filed a claim and have talked with multiple customer service agents and still haven't gotten my money back. It's been three weeks. They stole my money.

name: Tracy
review: Love this platform. Great tool to keep you updated on latest ways to stay on top of credit! Additional ways to help save also a great tool on track to a great credit score.

name: William
review: i have been with wells fargo bank for a number of years. I have always felt very comfortable to stop by any branch office and speak with a personal banker when needed and have alwYs received excellent service

name: Latoya
review: Takes too long to post payment after paying. Not really helping my credit like they promised it would. High interest rates also. Not benefitting me.

name: Kyra
review: The rewards suck after the first six months, but it is helpful for building credit as a young person. Once I had established a good credit score, I applied for a different credit card that provided more rewards.

name: Stacy
review: Limit increases are sometimes difficult to get and trying to change from secured to unsecured is almost impossible. Giving serious consideration to closing this account and opening another with my credit union.

name: Linda
review: My rating with Wells Fargo is high as I’ve encountered no problems with this company ever. I have always received top quality performance and no problems.

name: Kevin
review: Good loan. Lowered my annual percentage rate. Saving  me money on interest. I recommend Wells Fargo Installment Loan to everyone looking for a personal loan.

name: Barbara
review: Quickly approved and easy to manage. A good experience overall. I’m widowed and this helped the transition go smoothly. I would recommend it.

name: Jeffery Turnbow
review: Very slow to process payments and only one option to pay, wont let you use a debit card to pay balance., app hard to use, cant see pending charges.

name: Alex
review: I've had no issues thus far with my agreement. Card was pretty easy to acquire. I initially only asked for a smaller amount but was offered more with 0% interest.

name: Elmer
review: I started with this card as a secured credit card. After 6 or 7 month they changed it to a regular card and gave my money back. I recommend it.

name: Linda Pytell
review: I'd give a zero if allowed! Horrible experience all around! Totally disappointed in Wells Fargo for the way they mishandled our home equity line of credit application when they hold our home mortgage. Our loan officer seemed dishonest and stalled the process repeatedly with delay tactics. Never returned my husband's voicemails on his telephone number she was given over and over. Paperwork was mishandled and documents were resent by Certified Mail with confirmation they were received. I was told they were uploaded with wrong info on them and that was another delay? Assured application was complete. After 3 months of process loan officer asks if my husband still wanted to pursue loan. What?! We've been waiting on you for months!  Needed proof of homeowner’s insurance when Wells Fargo pays it through our mortgage! Totally incompetent? On purpose? Funny we were denied for an incomplete application! What a joke this has been after jumping through all of their hoops and waiting for too many months on Wells Fargo to close the deal. We feel this was all done on purpose and we will not be doing any business in the near future with Wells Fargo after being a loyal customer for many years. They should treat their customers better and stop being manipulative and dishonest.  Just say that these are hard times for loans, but don't blame the customer for all the problems Wells Fargo conjured up to stall loan.  Not happy customers at all! We do not recommend any Wells Fargo Bank for anyone's banking needs! There are plenty of banks out there that do not engage in deceptive practices that deserve your hard-earned money!

name: Raheem
review: This is great bank to join, especially for direct deposit and income depositing. It is a great way to build your credit and its it's best to open an account with wells fargo ad early as possible so that you can raise your score and make payments on time.

name: Robert
review: I'm very happy with my wells Fargo credit card. I didn't ask for a credit increase and wasn't expecting one it just showed up .I'm also very happy with wells Fargo service whether it's on the phone at the ATM or in my local office

name: Charles
review: Excellent service have never had any problems with them and when there was issues they handled it right away Very satisfied with their service

name: Charles
review: First card that gave me a decent CL .hoping that they will give cl increases as my score increases.i use it and pay it off monthly .I try not to carry any balance

name: Dinnette
review: I love my Wells Fargo Credit Card I have had a great experience being a account holder. I wish I could get my credit limit increased on this card to a higher dollar amount!!!

name: tskizzo
review: Check out their reviews on consumer affairs, 1 star!! I get why they are so low, I have been doing business with them for 24 years, both personal and business, as of now im looking for another bank to utilize. The list is too long to list as far as issues, although today I received my 100 plus call in 18 months from them regarding someone ' with the same name'  debt issues , not mine. I have explained this too them multiple times. I asked to be taken off the list and they tell me I must go through a screening to verify to them in am the incorrect person, so every time Until recently I have verified to them I am not the person they are looking for so I can be removed from future calls. Here we are a year and a half , and 100 calls later still being harassed. The tipping moment today was  the repetitive calls back in a row, because I didn't answer while I was with a client. Then I called them back just to have the person on the other end tell me that Im a liar, and that I was indeed the person they were looking for as OI answered they verifying questions once again, she implied all my answers were made up!

name: infobencrag
review: This is so amazing,i was doubting this service from the start not until it happened like magic, i had all negative collections removed and permanently deleted from my credit reports,morrisgraycracktechATgmailDOTcom is the best, he did a wonderful job for me , he boosted my credit score as high as 800s and he also increased my credit limit,he fixed my credit score permanently , now am free from all debts and loans ,i was able to get a new house for myself and my niece,i guarantee you if you have similar problems he will help you out immediately , i promised to tell people about his wonderful works , kindly tell him from Crag.

name: Cherry

review: They steal money from customers with fake overdraft charges. They also allowed my account to be accessed by someone who got my information. review: Wells Fargo is absolutely the worst bank I’ve be with  I have a fraud on my account and they refuse to help  anybody that was thinking to bank with them please don’t

Tried several phone numbers all give the same run around! That's OK - they have lost my business after a 27 year customer.

review: This is the worst banking experience that I have ever had. review: They have horrible customer service computer system needs updating ignorant employees worse experience ever I feel as though they stole my money during covid19 left my child stranded and hungry due to voiding a government check with their bank name across the top but they’re treating me like a thief

review: Love my card it was secured then became unsecured and my deposit was refunded immediately. I was advised to ask for a limit increase which I’ll be doing tomorrow.

name: naiara12005
review: The worst bank ever.!! Dont open a checking or saving account. Dont do it, never. I have a checking and saving account with this bank for more than 15 yes and also a credit card. The credit card interest at 15.99%. I called to lower the interest due to covid-19, the told me they can’t lower the interest. Im not going to use this card anymore and I am going to close the saving account and transfer it to chase.

name: Jen G
review: My card just graduated this month! I had actually been on here recently reading through reviews trying to get an idea of how long it would take and was feeling very discouraged by how many people mention they're still waiting. I was actually really surprised that I was getting an upgrade from what others said considering I only just started working on my personal 7 months ago. I've never been a fan of the whole credit system and avoided credit cards. (I'm in my mid 30s now in case anyone's interested.) My small business and discovering having credit for it matters is the only reason I started working on my personal credit, also starting with a secured credit card (through another bank). I finally got personal fico credit scores about a month ago (731, 715, 720) and an upgrade and credit increase on my personal card. I don't know if that has anything to do with why Wells Fargo also graduated my business secured card with them, but figured it might be worth mentioning. (I wasn't offered an increase on my business limit by the way, only graduation.) My business also recently established a Paydex score of 80, with all risk scores being either low or low-moderate on D&B and 80 on Experian Business, but can't find my business through Equifax for whatever reason. Please note my business's credit was established through Net30 accounts with a few other businesses, not the credit card which does NOT report to business credit bureaus despite what some websites falsely claim. I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 because of how ridiculously hard it is to get much information about anything when calling their credit department. My banker at the branch who helped me set up all my accounts is great though.

name: Joe
review: The card in general has the ability to give you freedom in the way of credit limits, but only if you already have a lot of money to put up for it first. Otherwise no rewards, no credit limit increases and their "overdraft protection" is absolutely garbage and charges you absurd amounts of money in order to protect yourself... with your own money.

name: Dale
review: They are slow in updating your credits, payments and balances. The bonuses they give are frugal and they are slow to credit your account

name: Matt
review: I had originally gotten my loan through Redfin and was sold to Wells Fargo in about two weeks after closing.  I'm not sure how Redfin made any money on that since nothing has changed Wells Fargo.

name: Reginald D James
review: Set the card up bad move should never set it up. Have not turned in to a real credit card yet so no star from me on this card always changing a fee when you spend your money..

name: Kenneth
review: Wells Fargo Bank report accurate information each month and therefore, I feel as customer this is what i expect from a creditor to do to for their customer. I have notice some creditors report only ever two or three months which allow incorrect accuracies of your credit balance.

name: Kenneth
review: Wells Fargo Bank report accurate information each month and therefore, I feel as customer this is what i expect from a creditor to do to for their customer. I have notice some creditors report only ever two or three months which allow incorrect accuracies of your credit balance.

review: WF is so very slow to apply payments as compared to my other bank cards. Frustrating! Shouldn’t take that long. They hold money hostage!

name: Angelos
review: Great New Card By Amex. I highly recommend and it is a stainless steel card. You have to great Credit score and low debt to ratio to get this card. Good Luck!

name: Valarie
review: Always helpful and willing to find solutions,quick to respond with answers or solutions.Representatives always polite and quick with  account transactions

name: earletteb
review: This is my 3rd home mortgage with Wells Fargo. I have been happy with the service thus far. Interest rates are low, would recommend.

name: Bo Poland
review: I get a good rate and good customer service. Also nice rewards. Rewards are able to be combined with my other Wells Fargo card for cash directly back into account.

name: Isaac
review: No annual fee and 3x the rewards on Gas, Restaurants & Bars, Hotels/Airbnbs, Airfare, Ridshare, Tolls, Transit, Car rentals, streaming services.

name: Janice
review: Helped with getting payments back on line. Had some difficult issues but they were handled and now I'm back in track. Hopefully will be able to make this a single owner home. Original spouse no longer wants it.

name: Steven
review: Had a VISA claim a while back, and the hoops I had to jump through... Made me just want to pay this card down as best I could. Good limit, though.

name: Ken
review: Quick and easy overview of all your credit card balances and score with very clear list of past and present.. there is always an explanation right away if there is any certain teachers credit

name: Hillary Marek
review: I started this when I was originally building my credit by opening a secured credit card through my bank with my tax return. After maintaining the secured card for two years Wells Fargo then issued me a platinum credit card and refunded the security deposit of $4000 I put on it. It is how I started to build my credit and it was a very wise investment because it Allotted me the credit I needed in order to get a car and then after paying off that car I had a credit score in the high 700s where before it was in the low 500s.

name: Fernando
review: This is a great card which I use for my business account. I love the no interest promotional rate on high priced purchases and eBay as well

name: Hencel
review: No real benefits—NONE!!!!! If you don’t use it often, credit limit will be decreased even if any other credit cards (the good ones) continue to reward your good credit behavior.

name: Katharine
review: It’s ok. Was signed up for this without given all the information. It has come in handy but with no rewards and the high interest rate it’s not worth having.

name: Brandon
review: The WF Propel is an awesome card. It has a great 0%/12mo intro rate and also an intro bonus. There are categories to earn points and it has no annual fee. All in all, a solid keeper card!

name: Jean-Pierre
review: Wrong account reporting to my credit bureau. I asked them to remove the account and they are making me wait for a long time to do so. I showed that I'm not the owner of this account and they still report it. Losers

name: Nikki
review: Take them forever to report the 3 credit bureau. I had different credit cards but never seen any report to the bureau so behind.  Its been for almost two months and closed the account as well and they still didn’t report the yo bureaus.  Horrible and very lazy for a big bank.  Stay away from this bank.

name: Delon
review: I just got this card , and will help me on my credit utilization , but all so I will use for day to day  and paying I full like the others, thanks

name: Phillip Pace
review: I have a mortgage through Wells Fargo, never been late.  Contacted them about removing PMI, the told me i would need an appraisal and then I could refinance or if the value is over simply remove it.  I investigated the refinance, they initially told me it would be $2500 + $500 for the appraisal the final cost when it came time to sign was $7700.  I then tried to use the appraisal to remove the PMI since the property value had increased enough, I was told that the appraisal I had gotten through Wells Fargo did not count!  So i have to pay ANOTHER $500 to get ANOTHER appraisal through Wells Fargo.  As soon as I move and get rid of this Mortage i will NEVER work with Wells Fargo again, for mortgages or even personal accounts.

name: cheryl cain
review: Never had a problem with them, must call to increase credit line. Good 0% offers for good customers and cards with rewards. Great card for beginners too.

name: Paula
review: I was able to do a balance transfer for 21 months for over $3800 which gave me enough time to pay off some other things so I could then focus on paying this card off before the promotional time ended. I am happy to say it will be paid in full this month!! EXCELLENT card for balance transfers.

name: Sylvia
review: It was great 0% for 18 mos.  We were able to pay off other balances on other cards. I would definitely recommend this card to others

name: Flor
review: I have the card and building my credit but I just pay it off and it drop my credit 144 points don’t like that I need to know why was my credit drop so high because I pay it off

name: seamushaney
review: Worst card ever I applied 2 months ago told I was approved and I’m still waiting for an account to be set upI call the 1800 # no answers I send emails daily no reply I walk into the bank they can’t help me they just tell me I’m approved

name: hbflcz
review: Worst experience with a credit card company so far.  I made my payment in full for my first month's charges but they put a hold on my payment, not allowing me to access my credit balance for over two weeks unless I sent documented proof of making the payment.  Basically holding my payment hostage for as long as they please.  And customer support said there is absolutely nothing they will do until I sent in documented proof of my payment.  Even though the payment has been cleared in my bank account over a week ago.  Worst experience ever.  I fully lost my trust in this bank.

name: Sherry
review: I really appreciate this card.It has helped me during a hard time.I have told a couple of friends about the card.Ibonly use it in emergency time only.

name: Roger
review: There are better cards that you can get with much better rewards. I would look to upgrade to something else or just not get it at all.

name: Samuel B
review: No Good. They never reported the payment to the Credit Bureaus. They never upgrade the Credit Card. They are very lazy. They don't have any Professional Ethics.

name: Quentin
review: 48 days and still not reporting my 0 balance. Reported correctly on my wife's  correctly.Via Tran.s Union(both).Since utilization is super important I am frustrated and would rate Dillards low,very low.

name: marianne
review: Why does it always take y'all 3 days to process a payment before it shows posted to my AmEx credit card? I know that the available balance is reflected immediately but there is always a 3 day lag time before the payment is actually posted to where I can see that the payment was made.

name: Anne Smith
review: We took out a jumbo mortgage in late 2016 and it was a very difficult loan process.   This was our 7th home, so 7 loans experience.   I was constantly on the phone trying to sign documents online which most of the time didn't work, had many glitches.  Volumes of paper were  sent for us as "disclosures" which was impossible to read through.  I spent hours with the lender working with him to get his system to work.  The loan did not close on time.  We were one day late but they did not offer to re-do the documents nor rebate us for the one day of interest we would have to pay and I was too tired to have to go through that headache again so did not press that extra 1 day interest payment we would have to make due to their inefficiencies.   In addition,  they didn't disclose all the fees until too late to the point that 2 years into the loan, we received a refund check for some of the fees. because they were required by law.   After the loan closed, the lender told  me I would receive a review request on how it went and said that the first three questions seem to read they were about him but they really weren't - so please answer all 5s.   We just re-financed this month with Rocket mortgage and it was the smoothest ever. Never met with anyone  in person, no volume of documents - just a closing statements with easy to read and understand fees disclosures. It  was seamless.

name: Benjamin
review: Shows balance that been paying off in full even when say " Payments on time" it's been 3 months a have no balance on any of my accounts but still shows a balance. Besides that's it's a great helping tool

name: Wayne
review: This one of the best card ont the world I love use it I’m going to want a upgrade soon I’m in love with it the best in the world thanks

name: Elizabeth
review: Not good with re-finances, they send offers all the time but the are not able to do it or they’ve got high refinance charges. Always some catch so we just switched to Rocket Mortgage for a 3.25% 30 year fixed.

name: Ralston
review: Good experience with the service they are always friendly and helpful. They  have great card offers with good credit history......

name: Wilson
review: Unless you have several credit cards or a Wells Fargo checking/saving account don't bother applying even if you have good to excellent credit with fairly long term spotless credit.  Furthermore attempting to talk to anyone of any usefulness is slim, took several attempts to get them to escalate the denial to have an actual human look over the application.

name: Dianne
review: I Love this company. I had a problem with someone else making a Large charge to Verizon, Verizon, Wells Fargo had the $1200 back in my account the very next day! Awesome customer service. I pay $300 -$400 every month because I want to stay in good standing. I love the service that they provide. Keep up the good work.

name: Bobbie
review: Been with them for many years. Had some adversity but through it all I stayed. They haven’t always given me opportunities when I needed them the most but I’m still grateful

review: I got their phone number from my 401k account. Waited for 3 hours on the line to be told that they have sub department dealing with 401k and it is already closed.

review: I’ve paid off my cc well over a month ago.. still not reported to credit bureaus. My car lease is almost up and I need to purchase a new car, but waiting forever for WF. Get it together, guys.

name: Norbert
review: Thank you very much I would truly appreciate this to to help me manage my credit I am looking forward to continued to increase my quit and continuing to do better to grow my credit history

name: Leighsa
review: I like Wells Fargo and I like my Wells card and I REALLY like the ease of the Wells bank app, to be able to turn my card off. I like being able to pay my card in the bank app.

review: This account has a 0 balance . This needs to reflect a 0 balance . Take a look at this account which lowers my credit score. There is 0 balance !!!!

name: Lakisha
review: I love it! It teaches you a lot when it comes to your credit!. As a single mother over years of trying, I finally understand my credit.

review: I love it.  I was able to install a new heat pump wth the help of Wells Fargo credit card. They helped me when no other financial institution would. Thanks Wells Fargo
