review: Wells Fargo has stood by me since the beginning no matter the case they helped me build from a teenange mother to a confident young business women.when they say 24 hour help they stand by it and help I've needed budgeting or dealing with fraud they were always there in a very timely manner.  Thank you Wells Fargo!!

name: Christine
review: They are not helpful an would rather use information to mislead consumer rather than do what they should. I would never use them for anything again.

name: earletteb
review: Great customer service, responsive. Everything you want in a financial services company. I've recommended them to family and friends.

name: Luis
review: The loan process went smooth and I was clear to close quickly. Full disclosure, I have a background in lending and was very much on top of things throughout the process.

name: JOSEPH
review: Wells Fargo calls themselves a relationship bank. What a joke. Their system some how fails to recognize I have had a deposit relationship with them since 1988. Pathetic $2,000 credit line. About to cancel. Strongly recommend taking business elsewhere, which I’m in process of doing with trust fund. Therefore I prefer Citibank, Bank of America, JP Morgan Chase, US Bank, In my mind these cover all categories. These banks recognize private client relationships when doing credit lines. citigold and Merrill edge preferred platinum honors.I do have penFed for gas and groceries and Cap one grandfathered savor. Wonderful lines there too.Bank of America Cash Rewards covers home improvement, PenFed gas and Groceries, Citi does streaming with Premier, Bank of America travel categories.

name: Morgan
review: Cash back percentage is nice but I wish there were specials to receive more $$$ in Cashback. Interest rate is very reasonable and I like being able to access my FICO score

name: djresnick
review: WF customer service is testing American patience by consistently getting worse. It is the desire of WF management to see how much people will tolerate prior to moving to another bank. For long term customers like myself this is a horrible problem. Example - I ordered a RSA security device that did not arrive in the 5-7 business day window (5-7 business days, really? The device could be placed on the back of a small donkey or horse and get to most places in that time), Using the online secure messaging system I waited a day to get this response - "We apologize but we cannot answer RSA questions via secure messaging." What is secure messaging for then?!? Ok, at least they gave me a special number so I only had to wait on hold for 50 minutes. BTW - I have called WF dozens of times and on different days and different hours for the past 15 years, always getting the message - "We apologize for the long delay, currently we are experiencing high call volume." One must wonder who runs the department. Timely answering of phones is a real brain twister.

name: Debra
review: Good for monitoring. This is a good way to keep yourself on track with your payments. Helps to track my credit scores and updates monthly.

name: Brooke Cunningham
review: A company that fired innocent people and stole from regular people ,watch the show Dirty Money on Netflix and you will shut down your account real fast I did in a heart beat. They had terrible customer service all over CT anyways. Seeing how they screwed over people made me fearful I would be next. Nope goodbye WF

name: Ian
review: good to get cash but website is terrible. seperate sites to pay and get information.easy to get advance money to checking account.

name: Benjamin
review: I am learning Wells Fargo is not the most honest and reliable bank out there, but choices are quite limited. Seems like WF is closing branches, making it inconvenient to use a bank and now they have closed their branches inside stores where it’s currently not very safe to be.

name: Vernika
review: Great for first timers. Well help your credit in the time frame it says. They do report to the credit card bureau. So give them a try.

name: David
review: Linked to my checking account, high interest rate but a was a great card to add to my wallet. Am paying it down, rewards points are pretty weak.

name: Joseph
review: Wells Fargo installment loan was good low rate interest loan. I like the customer service that the Wells Fargo customer dept. really care about their customers..

name: Joseph
review: My experience with Wells Fargo was always a excellent experience. Their customer service representative are a pleasure to work with.

name: Sohel
review: So far no problem, every transaction went smooth. However, I would wait a couple of months before I make any further comments about this Credit Card, .

name: Barry
review: Currently l am please with the service and monthly documented explanation of my mortgage loan with WFHM. The online service is very accessible.

name: Mary Grace McCormick
review: Overall, I have few complaints. ATMs are everywhere and when I can't find one, mobile deposit makes it easy. Zelle enables me to transfer money to non-WF customers. My only complaint relates to the fraud department - often they will stop any electronics purchase over $200, but somehow approved a fraudulent money order that cleaned out my account. They made it right, but it was very frustrating to deal with.

name: mark
review: One of the best cards I’ve had since graduating from grad school and now on my way to law school. Ease of online accessibility and rewards are what’s important to me hence this card is great.

name: Shawn
review: Wells Fargo gives very low credit lines they do not have the most user friendly app. When I signed up for the card I was not able to receive the sign up bonus because my limit was soo low.

name: Oluwatola
review: The secured card has been really helpful but the annual fee is really unnecessary. It like they are taking advantage of your lack of credit history. After 7 months I expect them to have contacted me with a move to an unsecured card but still waiting especially because I have good and responsible usage. Good but not great in my opinion

name: Maureen
review: Nothing to write home about.  Started as a secured card in 2018 and was just unsecured 2020 with a low limit. Go with a different bank if possible.

name: Frank
review: Wells Fargo was always good to me one of the best  Banks I think very good service so if u chose wells Fargo you be happy that u chose them

name: Emily
review: Love that they gave me am opportunity with a decent credit limit when I needed one. Have made all payments on time since obtaining in 2017 with no credit limit increases however.

name: Fehmi
review: I bought a computer for my son at the University of Houston. Wells fargo bank gave him the loan. After paying 1 month in installments, I paid the full debt. But this bank still trades as if I'm paying my monthly installments regularly. I complete all of my debt paid. I don't understand why I still see this in historical balance and report detail. That's why I give this bank 1 star and I don't intend to work with this bank in the future .

name: Celia
review: I have been banking with Wells Fargo for over 10 years. I love the rewards, cash back, and how fast I made credit history. After 6 months of opening my credit card I received my deposit back.

name: slkmoore
review: I have really tried to be patient but they give you the runaround about identity not verified for a rejection - even when you bring in the required documents to a Wells Fargo branch. But they say only your name can be on the document but then they say your equal payment plan has money owed but do not look at the document to see over the year I am ahead (winter is payback - summer is when it evens out). 3 phone calls, still the same garbage of cannot find a supervisor. With a credit score of 790. DO NOT APPLY TO THIS CREDIT CARD - it is a no go - if I could move my MORTGAGE I WOULD!

name: Julia Miller
review: I applied for a Bob’s Discount Furniture credit card online on March 1st, 2020. I was approved and was told someone was going to contact me. Fast forward to today, March 10th, not a peep from anyone. I called Bob’s Customer Service they were very helpful and looked up the things I wanted in their inventory and answered all of my questions but they had no record of me applying. I had to check my credit report to see what the inquiry was listed as because Bob’s goes through 3 different creditors. It was Wells Fargo that approved me.  So, the Bob’s Discount sales associate was nice enough to give me the customer service number for them. So, I call Wells Fargo and the customer service representative couldn’t find my application or any record of me for a half an hour. Finally, he came back on the phone and asked for my phone number. I gave it to him and he said, “Oh, this must be why.”  At this point I’m thinking, ok, I gave you my ssn and dob multiple times, you don’t find anything, but something magically popped up when I gave you my cellphone number after 30 mins of being in hold? Odd. He proceeds to tell me, “You have been denied and you will get something in the mail within 30 days.” What? I was already approved? Is this letter going to explain why I was approved and then denied? Because I know it’s not because of my credit, I have “EXCELLENT” credit according to TransUnion and CreditWise. The whole thing just seems fishy. I’ve never experienced such unprofessionalism. No email, no phone call and I had to track them down. They approved me, then couldn’t find my information, then denied me. My plan was to get my living room furniture from Bob’s and close out my Jordan’s furniture account, but now Jordan’s will be the one getting my business. I called Bob’s to let them know that, and give them the heads up that they’re losing business because of them.  Who else did this happen to and didn’t tell them? I was looking forward to becoming a transferring customer, but I won’t be letting my credit suffer to do so.

name: Darlene Taylor
review: I had a Fico Score of 682 when I applieed and was instantly approved for 2k CL  however APR is high on this card if you have any blemishes on your credit. I am in the rebuild stage so just to be approved made me feel good .I have made every possible credit mistake in the past do trust me when I say good credit is hard to acchieve but easy to lose.

name: Annie K
review: I've had an excellent experience with WellsFargo for close to a decade now. Great offers, security and friendly help whenever needed. I've had the chance to use their services beyond checking and have been quite pleased over the years. Living abroad, at university and locally, I never had any issues accessing my accounts, funds or customer service. Highly recommended.

name: Zachary
review: Ok for what it is. I personally haven't recieved a credit limit increase despite score being in upper 700s. The only reason this card with it's paltry 1% cash back is still open is it's my longest held credit account.

name: Jason
review: Card is better quality then most other credit cards plus wells Fargo has always treated me right. Amazing rewards, good reward redemption options and I just got a balance transfer promotion for 3% for a year!! Even after the fact that I had a year at 0% when i applied along with a bonus of 300$ when I spent a whatever amount of money in 3 months. WOW I dont get how they can make money honestly with so many promotions, massive points for cash back, and quality card/service? Maybe they think I'm not paying it in full every month I dont know but there literally couldn't be a better card out there without the bank going bankrupt!!!

name: Barbara
review: They have always helped me. Customer service is always there to help you with a problem so is there credit card people. Been with them over 6 yrs it’s not like it use to be but still great people.

name: Vincent N
review: It doesn’t let me buy anal or sex toys  I ve been trying to buy young girls from Russia and Saudi’s but they don’t accept Wells Fargo only bitcoin in the thousands

name: Emalyn
review: Is easy to talk on phone and email hoever no physical address in the state of Indiana so, is difficult to go to their bankand, that sucks

name: Render Walker
review: It was ok to get a card to start off but after more than a yr of on time payments I was never offered the unsecured card so I don't feel like it was much help beyond that.

name: Anna
review: Excellent automatic category point redemption .  I dont have to remember to activate every month.  The higher rewards are gas, travel and food

name: Burleigh Johnston
review: I have had a Wells Fargo account for 14 years but I closed my checking account 6 years ago due the negative news reports but have kept a charge card with no problems.  I may go back to them for checking.

name: Paul
review: My daughter is 30 years old with three children in the last two years. I co-signed for her student loan 10 years ago. She’s been making payments on time and recently closed 3 of her business. She told Wellsfargo what was going on so they attacked me and my credit score.

name: johnjdozierjr
review: I give this 5 stars for a few reasons.  1. Convienance,  I have my checking account with WF as well so when I login everything is right there. 2 Free cell phone insurance when used to pay cellphone bill. 3. The first 2 combined with 1.5 cashback and no fees just make it one of my favorites.

name: Vincent
review: This card was received as part of a promotion from the provider. After the balance was paid off, the card was never used for any other purchase.

name: William
review: Thank you for approving my lawn I really appreciate it you are the best branch in our local neighborhood I really enjoy working with you and plan on bettering my accounts

name: songbird210
review: This bank has done nothing but cause me trouble for the last 6 months.  My account was hacked into in the fall of '19 and since that happened my new Mac card has been repeatedly did, despite the fact that there was a fair amount of money in my account.  I am guessing that I have spent over 25 hourd on the phone trying to resolve denied Mac card purchases, bounced checks (when there was plenty of money in the account.  I went to the bank in person several times, the most recent being four day ago, trying to get a Mac card that could be used since there was money in my bank account.  I left the bank after an hour and a half and absolutely nothing was resolved.  Tonight, before coming home after work, my Mac card was denied again. I am not calling there rvr again.  I have begun the process of moving my account to another bank.  I would NEVER recommend that anyone use Wells Fargo. Customer Service by phone gave me misinformation more times than I can even remember at the point.    The phone wait time is far too long.  I have never dealt with a bank that was so difficult to deal with before.  PLEASEE DO NOT BRING YOUR BUSINESS TO Wells Fargo.  I promise you that you ill be sorry you did business with them.

name: Jill
review: Wells Fargo does everything it can to ruin your credit and your life. They lured me into a loan modification with the promise of a lower monthly payment. After months of being forced to re-do paperwork over and over again my payment went down by a measly $54. They then tacked on $14,000 in fees at the end of the process claiming I owed them that for them "helping" me modify the loan. CROOKS!!!

name: Flip
review: Great if you stay on top of payments, but nasty if you miss one. There are phone calls and email alerts that don't stop even if just a few days behind on payment.

name: Henderson
review: Please add the automatic credit increase without a HARD PULL. This card can much more valuable with the best conditions possible. Maintaining a strong customer base should drive most banks.

name: jgerber62
review: Aweful, aweful customer service, over the phone, and in person at a branch:20+ year Wells Fargo customer, great standing, debit/credit cards, checking and savings accounts.The other day I received an alert for a charge I didn't make, this alert led to the finding of many other fraud charges, I called up Wells to file a claim, and instead of helping me figure out what was going on, they denied the claim in 5 minutes, and told me there was nothing I could do.On my phone calls, I spoke with three tier 1 support reps, two tier 2 support reps, and I was treated rudely, talked down to, and ignored.  Not a single person to anytime to see if something was happening they plugged in some numbers, and gave me a response.Local branch manager was just as unhelpful, ignored me, and when I said I didn't feel safe with my money here, and I was thinking of pulling it out, he said "you gotta do what you gotta do" and walked away.After 20 years, they gave me 5 minutes of consideration.... You'll hear adds about how wells fargo has changed, that they're not the same bank that contributed hugley to the downturn in 07, 08... but it's not... they're still all about that bottom dollar...

name: Steven
review: I was grateful to get the card without any interest so I could help pay down some of my other higher interest rate loans. It's helped tremendously

name: Victor
review: They held my secured deposit for 5 years and the customer service is a joke! I also held bank accounts with them which did not help my credit card experience at all. They only reason remain open with me is because they are one of my oldest accounts.

name: Robert B
review: I only have this for my ATM use.  I would never recommend a Debit card since if lost or stolen they can immediately deplete your entire checking account.

name: Elizabeth
review: Amazing. This app has changed the way I view money. The app is a life changer. I am learning better habits and changing my future!

name: Joshua
review: Wells Fargo is extremely hard to deal with, weather its bank, credit, loan or mortgage. I have never had a great customer experience and switch mortgage lenders was a nightmare.

name: yellayawm87
review: Horrible service I requested a stop payment on a company who had 4 pending charges the lady on phone assured me I will be charge a one time $31 stop payment fee for all four they ended up charging me 4 x $35 I call next day and as I go through different levels of tellers I could hear them in background totally laughing and mocking me u felt like sh** the whole time like why the hell do I have a checking and savings account with people who treat me like this I felt like I was treated worst than an inmate at Guantanamo Bay they are just awful to their customers

name: Alexis
review: I’ve been with them for years on other accounts my home is one yet they have only a small increase so it really isn’t a great vard

name: Deborah
review: I have been happy to know my house will be paid off this year Wells Fargo has been helpful in making it happen I am grateful for it

name: Michael
review: It’s convenient  when trying to rebuild after a tough time in its easy toPay and keep up with right there on the phone so I hope it helps others as well

name: Ad Mae
review: I have been a 10 year+ cardholder and recently suffered a fraudulent charge on my account. After months of calls and struggling, Dillards determined that myself or "someone I gave permission to use my card" made the purchase and would not cover the charge. They did not alert me that I had a balance due (my e-mail was correct in their system), and it tanked my credit score from an 840+ to around 750. I have fought with the credit bureaus with no luck, needless to say I closed this account.

name: Thomas
review: I enjoy this card. It has been a great card, I would like to have a credit increase for this card so I could use it more for other purchases.

name: Chenaniah
review: Good banking system. Atms are nearby me. Apps are very helpful to manage your finances. Haven't had any problems with well fargo. Good job

name: Cheryl
review: Wallet hub always informs me if any credit is opened in my name at any time. I can always no my credit score at a glance. I very much approve this app.

name: Thomas
review: Excellent Home Mortgage loan with a great low rate.  Provided me a wonderful opportunity to pay a set amount of money every two weeks which is deducted, that is actually lowering the overall payment with interest I will pay for the extent of the loan. Great company to have  mortgage with.

name: Thomas
review: I used this card to pay off major purchases I had at the end of 2019, in order to utilize a 0 % interest promotion.  This is a great card to have. My mortgage is also with Well's Fargo

name: timssjr
review: During a seemingly easy loan,  multiple times Wells Fargo gave me little to NO  notice of underwriting changes to my loan. These changes were after deposits would be lost and FORCED me to go along with changes. The main issue was "they" could not understand how I could commute to another state and they refused to make my loan a PRIMARY RESIDENCE.... thus making it a second home loan ( even though I live there).   It forced my interest rate up, deposit up, and PMI up...... I would have lost $2500 if I backed out so I was stuck. I WAS BASICALLY EXTORTED FOR MORE MONEY FOR NO REASON.  I am in the process of refinancing the loan with a credit union..... as a primary residence !!!!!!   DONT USE WELLS FARGO !!!!! EVER !!!!!!!

name: Daniel
review: The Appleton family has been rcvd in the study. I will have the Remminton familu join them. A beautiful night to have a party. Wish you had the best

name: Albert R
review: It was a nice credit card to have. Paid off monthly. They raise my credit limit after several months of paying on time. They gave me a great introductory offer.

name: Linda
review: Wells Fargo are very nice people to do business with. Never had any issue with Wells Fargo that they did not immediately work things out and satisfy me completely.

name: Donna
review: Great card great point accumulation able to use it at all stores getting airline tickets shopping for clothes all around great score on this card glad I have the opportunity to obtain this card

name: Bolis
review: No late payments every thing ok updated the account is current and problems has been fixed nothing wrong now in the account every thing updated

name: Christine T
review: The intro offer prior to 12/31/2019 was 30,000 points and has now been reduced to 20,000. Wells Fargo gave no notice that this DOWNGRADE would be occurring. What terrible communication. I applied a few days after the deadline and let them know that I didn't realize this was happening and they were not willing to retroactively change it. This is the lack of transparency their company has.

name: Daniel
review: There are really no bells and whistles to this card.its a microcenter insider credit card( issued by wells fargo) its your basic store credit card like bestbuy that gives 5% cash back if paid off your purchase that month...i use it because they offer more electronics than bestbuy for local pickup...

name: Barbara
review: Right now I have a 18 months no interest. This is why I don’t need to apply for a lower rate. I will monitor my account. Thanks for the offer.

name: Constance
review: I'm glad I have this in case I have an emergency here in the home. It will be easier to pay monthly fee than it is to try and find the money up front to make the repairs

name: Garfield
review: No Annual Fee store card from Wells Fargo.  They reported my new credit card to the agencies in 4 days after opening and reported the full $1,700 balance without giving me a change to pay it off, my Utilization went up and my credit score went down.  That was not fair.

name: Jessica
review: I have used Wells Fargo for over 10 years and haven’t had any problems with my mortgage. Nice company to do business with. I would finance with them again

name: Carla
review: Interest kicked in very high without warning * i paid off this card twice * recently 3 weeks ago full pay off and it still hasnt been reported to transunion.

name: Alexander
review: 3 percent on so many useful categories. No annual fee, along with a fantastic signup bonus. It’s basically the Amex gold card without  the fee.

name: Mohamed Riyad
review: Every bodey he is need to get Wells Fargo I want to say thank you Wells Fargo Wells Fargo  it was very easy to useand I would only recommend cards without fees, Wells Fargo fast and EasyPay® Prepaid Card ReviewsI realy want every time with wells fargo and i want  rating more....

name: Dennis
review: I asked for a personal loan in 2013, and was turned down. When I applied at a nearby bank. It was approved the following day for $25,000.  When I asked WF to help reduce the interest rate on my Visa credit card, again WF said No! I asked WF, if there were any late or past due payments on my account, their answer was No! I applied for a balance transfer at a different bank, and again I was approved. No thank to WF!

name: Sarah
review: I’ve always had a good relationship with Wells Fargo, a few times over the years Wells Fargo has held my mortgage and I’ve continually had a positive experience.

name: LOUIS
review: Good card so far. Credit increase automatic in a short amount of time. Jury still out on that APR at the end of promotional period.

name: Marc
review: Reasonable rate for large line of credit that is not secured. Easy to access line of credit. Simple to transfer funds to banking account for needs and payments.

name: Sergio
review: Great card for establishing credit. It has no annual fees. It starts at $600 dollars. It gives you access to your FICO credit score which updates each month. It has also a phone protection plan if you pay your phone's bill with this credit card.

name: Ronald
review: This card was great for helping me out through a tough spot, however now that I am out of it, this card’s interest rate is really high, and no way to lower it.

name: v_portu
review: I have experienced a very unpleasant situation.My other bank's credit card payment was due on Jan/06/2020.So, on Dec/31/2020, I logged in to Wells Fargo online banking and tried to schedule a bill payment. The only acceptable option that was offered to me was:"Send on Jan/02  -- Deliver by Jan/06", which I selected and scheduled the payment of $1443.90.Now I see that my credit card received that payment on Jan/07/2020, which is past the due date.Do you understand the consequence of that late payment for me?This is a very bad business practice of Wells Fargo.

name: Michael
review: This is an “ok” card. It takes a while for your credit to free up, there are no rewards, and they never offer to bump up your credit limit. The app is easy to use, but it does not notify you when charges are made, like capital one’s does. Pretty much the only good thing about it is the ease of use with the app

name: Ian
review: This was a secured visa that had no perks whatsoever. I hardly ever used it and never had a reason to keep it. I dislike the customer service Wells Fargo offers and haven’t done any business with them since closing this account.

name: David
review: They are really good for a card card I like the way they can get a lot done like to go in the local bank that is near my work or at home

name: aaron saxton
review: If I had written a review in the first month it would have been 5 stars; buts thats before the illegal charges they started dumping on our credit card after 3 months. Every single charge has been reversed and in every single instance they refuse to explain how a charge even got on the credit card. This isn't a bank - its a criminal enterprise that should have its banking license revoked.

name: Franklin
review: Well so far I like having the card and I’m learning how to use it and will try to always do the right thing with the card. Thank you very much for helping me get the card

name: ANGELIA
review: No annual fee. Awesome cash back rewards. I always pay my debt in full. They also monitor your credit score if you prefer. I rate 5

name: Linda
review: Wells Fargo is a great loan company and I highly recommend them. I’ve had a home loan with this company since 2004 and have never encountered any problems.

name: Janessa Hunt
review: I have had Wells Fargo now for two years and just recently I exceeded the federal D limit on my savings once this month and once like maybe 6-7 months ago. I use it for emergencies and to save up for a car. But because I have exceeded it twice in the last year my savings account is being turned into a checking account . I emailed them about this because I only exceeded it twice which I  have never done before and they said they couldn’t help me that it would be turned into a checking account so I guess I’m taking my business to another bank because that’s ridiculous I paid the stupid $15 fee and I’ve been a loyal customer for a long time I’ve only exceeded that stupid rule twice and this is how they treat me with bad customer service

name: barbara
review: Great card for bigger necessary purchases, I am very happy with Wells Fargo. Thank you Wells Fargo, for helping me with my purchases.

name: Jean-Harmel
review: Wells Fargo is a great financial institution, in that it rewards well those who act responsibly wit their finances. I am proud to be their client.

name: William
review: So far so good.Glad to have a way of building my credit.I have lived with bad credit for a long time.This due to never have making sound financial decisions

name: Thomas
review: This was a new furnace, a/c, water heater and softener. WF loan with Carrier. Unfortunately, it shows up like a credit card with 100% usage. 60 months 0% $208/mo.

name: Manuel G Ramos
review: Great card. It has lots of benefits for travel gas and many other things. It is metal, not plastic, and the Wells Fargo site is very easy to navigate.

name: Tyrone
review: Account info is readily available and easy to access. Receive regular updates on interest rate changes and rate reduction opportunities.

name: Rachel
review: Bought my above ground pool with the Outdoor Solutions card with a promotion of 0% for 60 months. It’s not a credit card affiliated with Visa, MasterCard, Discover or Amex. It’s funded by Wells Fargo and can be used in a few places that cater to home improvement. Payment is automatically deducted from my bank account. I will never pay a penny of interest as long as I pay the scheduled payment every month. Card acts more like a loan than a credit card. Overall, card made my backyard dream a reality.The Propel came with a good promo, 0% for 12 months on purchases, and offers 3% back on streaming and insures your cell phone if you pay your phone bill with card for approx $695. Very happy so far. Was hesitant with all the bad press on Wells Fargo, but it seems like they got their act together.

name: Innocent
review: Good rebate for every day purchases not too good of interest rates not good for large purchases introduction incentives ok I would have rated this 5 ?

name: Monica
review: I’ve been with Wells Fargo for more than 10yrs and I’ve been they a tough situation that they were always getting g me out of. I appreciate everything done for me

name: gari
review: great    experience     would  do  again  thanks   for  helping  me  get  my    heat  and   air  unit     cause    old  one  quit.

name: allisonc_31
review: Wells Fargo is a pain. I have several loans and whenever I talk to them its like pulling teeth. They are not flexible on repayment options.

name: Jamie
review: I love my secure card. I’ve had it 9 months with no issues at all. Trying to get my credit rating up using this card and it seems like it’s working.

name: Briana
review: Low into APR but no other benefits for this card. No intro benefits and now I have to continue writing until this review is finished.

name: Stephen
review: Thankful. Chase has been instrumental in helping to develop my financial security. The bank is accessible and when visiting, they are helpful.

name: auntnano71802
review: Dear Wells Fargo I hope you read this. You will be losing a lot of customers when they see how you apply payments to promos# I sent Wells Fargo over $2500. I told them to apply it to my promo running out the soonest so it would be paid off! They instead split the payment between 3 of the zero percent promos i have. 2 which are not due till 6 months later. I have called numerous times and i thought I would be recieving a check but I was once again lied to. I was refered to 3 departments that can not help me. Finally I was told they are sending it to the head of the company. I asked how long it will take to get a response and I was told I dont know. We are a MONTH behind in cases. Dear wells fargo it seems you then have a issue with your services. I myself am lucky enough to have other credit cards I can transfer ALL of my promos too and they will apply MY MONEY to MY account the WAY I WANT. They do NOT rip people off the way you are trying to do and they might even notice. Farewell crooks!

name: Charles Tilley
review:
This is why we have to go online & manually pay the bill of OUR choice......not leave it up to the financial institution to do so. One can do this with a simple smartphone app.

Anyone with bank accounts, to include credit cards, auto loans & mortgages should have an online account. This gives us precise control over what we want (example, how I paid an extra $300/month on my mortgage every month). Same goes for credit cards.

name: Keith P
review: I like the ease of using this credit line because it is linked to my bank accounts making transfers easy.  I have never had an issue with customer service.

name: William
review: Wells Fargo is a good rewards card. But you must learn to stay within their rules. And they will help you as much as they possibly can. And I have found that the nicer you are to the Reps the nicer they'll be to you I'm happy with the card.

name: James
review: I love my banker, Estee Nash of the West Hollywood,,Ca branch on Santa Monica Blvd. However, with my credit score as high as it is, and.it’s even higher with Equifax, I felt that the rate of 11% per yer was too high and they really didn’t care whether I stayed a client with them or not! And I’ve been banking with them as a customer since 1996!

name: SARAH GRANGER
review: Wish I could leave negative 5 stars for this company. The Welcome Bonus of $150 you are promised if you spend $500 within the first 3 months is complete bogus. Opened the card last month and spent $524 within 3o days. My current rewards balance is $7.86.Was on hold for over an hour with multiple people, got all the way up to the executive department. The staff acts like you are speaking a foreign language like they have no clue about the welcome bonus. The welcome bonus was offered to me in the mail WITH the card offer.Stay away from this card, or Wells Fargo in general. They are a dishonest company.

name: Deborah L Patrie
review: Been good to me over 20 years. Longest account and always stood by me. Good rate. First credit card for me. Wells had bad publicity for awhile.  They are trying to clean it up. Who am I to judge anyway?

name: Alexander
review: This is one of the worst secured card ever, despite their advertisement of graduation at 18 months and even promises from banker they refer you to the fine print and keep making excuses as to to items on your credit report. My credit score has increased by 200 points since getting this card, granted I’ve worked at it and paid down down debt but their excuses are unending. I got a Discover It Secure Card about a 8 months after this card with three times the credit limit and they already graduated me but Wells Fargo keeps making excuses. I don’t close it cause it’s my longest revolving credit line if not they would be gone.

name: tsf_3984
review: Dillards is a disgrace. I have been a Dillards CC holder for 15 years. Due to missing two payments they decided to close my account.  No warnings, no phone calls, no letters of notifications, nothing...  Remind you that my account has a $5,000 credit limit with $112 used on it.  I have never missed a payment in the 15 years that I have had the account.  You would think they would have sympathy or understanding but nope.  They are full of it.  I will NEVER get another Dillards cc with them and I recommend no one else gets one either.

name: Felipe
review: Wells Fargo screwed my credit up last year when they didn't get the money from prior lenders when they bought my loan... I had to pay 300 bucks to fix my credit when it wont my fault... Said i didn't pay my mortgages for 3 months on my credit... Didn't even offer to pay

name: Nickolaus
review: Great company to work with. Helpful and courteous throughout the entire process. Good rate. I would absolutely go through Wells Fargo again.

name: Renee
review: Wells Fargo is the most Compassionate, Understanding, Mortgage Company EVER-Hands Down!!! I was in a Finacial Nightmare and my Mortgage fell over 10 months behind! Wells Fargo Reached out to ME and Offered their Help and Assistance!!! I will ONLY use Wells Fargo for any Future Mortgage needs. I Recommend them 101% ...WFHM are #1 !!!!!!!Thank You Wells Fargo, you are My Heros!!!

name: Natalie
review: Been with Wells Fargo for many years, even when moved to Oklahoma that has absurd laws forbidding national chain banks, such as Wells Fargo. But in the age of online banking that law is so outdated! Love Wells Fargo and have no reason to switch!

name: Edward
review: They you have always been willing to work with us. They've allowed more than one modifications to the loan.  Good lender.  I would recommend them as a good home lender.

name: meit_michael
review: I feel compelled to write about my experience with Wells Fargo after my mother died and I needed to cancel her card. I was directed to the "deceased department", which later turned out to be a collections department. I called twice and they never got back to me. When I finally was able to talk to someone on the 3rd try, the first thing he did was try to entrap me into saying I was responsible for any of her debt. "Are you the person who is now responsible for this account?"  "Yes"  "So to be clear then, you have now accepted responsibility for any debt remaining in this account".  And then he offered condolences.  Let me say I cancelled two other cards without either of those companies giving me any issues.  This was just sleazy and I will never bank with Wells Fargo after this experience. And her total balance...$40, which I was happy to pay.  These people only care about one thing, and it isn't their customers.

name: Kayla
review: Fine. No troubles and lots of assistance when payments needed to be later than usual due to financial issues and medical bills otherwise fine

name: Michael
review: This card is excellent for raising your credit score it report to all three bureaus.They are accurate in there reporting. You can increase your limit to as much as $10,000.It is not a reward card but it is a must have for credit building.I wish I would have opened it much sooner.

name: Kimhun
review: Great help for me to get better credit and help me find a way to get a home for me and family I keep checking my credit every day and hope to get a perfect score

name: Stephen
review: Love having the LOC. Saved me a few times when I was in crisis. May soon ask for an increase in the new year. I appreciate WF for their assistance.

name: Beatriz Comesanas
review: I would never bank with Wells Fargo again. I have a mortgage with Wells Fargo as well as a credit card. Also, I have a Wells Fargo in the building of my job. This is why when I received an offer to open a checking account with them and receive $400, I thought it was a great time to try them out. The promotion stated that I needed to have direct deposits totaling $3,000/month for 3 consecutive months within the first 150 days of account opening. I received the offer in May and opened the account and changed the direct deposit with my employer. Unfortunately, my employer requires a prenote (meaning the direct deposit change will no become effective until after an entire payroll cycle has been processed). Due to the prenote and the payroll schedule at my job, my first direct deposit of $1,500 came in June. I had 2 more $1500 direct deposits in July and then $4500 in August. My last direct depot before my maternity leave was August 30th and I'm still on maternity leave. After waiting for months for my bonus, I finally call the bank and I'm told I did not meet the qualifications because although I had $9,000 direct deposited in 3 months, there was $1,500 in June and $4,500 in August and it had to be $3,000 each month. This is so ridiculous. At the end of the day, I had $9,000 deposited within 3 months like the promotion said. The fact that this went all the way up to the executive offices of Wells Fargo and it was still not honored, makes me never ever want to bank with Wells Fargo. Even more, I would caution anyone else to bank with them either. I'm so happy I didn't go through the hassle of switching over all my finances to them as I intended to. I was disqualified on such a small technicality and the fact that had my maternity leave not started when it did, I would have qualified with one more direct deposit. No one seemed to really care or even consider what I was saying so I will be closing out my account and probably my credit card as well.

name: Philip
review: Having the Wells Fargo Visa linked to my Wells Fargo bank accounts provides easy access to transfers and payments. The card also has a generous points program

name: Roger F
review: Run of the mill, no perks. I really don't like how they only show itemised fee breakdown in the monthly statement, and not on my account info screen. Feels like mystery money is being taken away from me.

name: Jeffrey
review: Rocky start... but has been great since. Started with a low credit limit and lots of hassles. They put holds on my payments. Even sent a letter telling me to come into a branch and give them information on my checking account. After the first 6 months, the account has been great!

name: Shervin Haei
review: This is my last time using this bank. Very inconvenient. DO NOT FALL FOR REWARDS. I have a “ cash Wise credit card” my reward points is down to $46. I am trying to use this amount towards my balance or get a check for my money that I earned. But they are saying they can use just $25 of that and the rest it has to for fitted or I have to keep using the card to reach $25. Also the reward department asking for my “ previous address”. I said I told you my pervious address. They said the reward department is the only department that uses the previous address. I used this bank 18 years ago and haven’t used that ever since. So how I can remember my address from 18 years ago. and if I remember that address from 18 years ago they give an option to buy a $50 gift card and pay off  $4. please please DO NOT FALL FOR THIS reward card.

name: V Denise
review: I love my American Express card! I collect points on every purchase. I already flown round trip on some rewards. I encourage everyone to get this card. Thanks Mr. Wells!

name: Lynne
review: Too new for anything to say. I only have the card to build my credit back and its doing that so mission accomplished I guess. done

name: Marilyn
review: Always dependable and I have been with wells Fargo for over 20 yrs with several accounts. I have checking, Savings, and 2 Credit Cards. I am very happy looking to get a home equity line to pay all above off...lol

name: Sarah
review: So far I have had no issues with this card. And I got $150 cash back for spending $500 in the first 3 months! They say the best way to utilize it is only use 30% of your total amount to spend and that has helped greatly with raising my credit score.

name: Dennis
review: As a good customer who pays on time without any late payments. I have spoken with my branch manager a number of times on reducing my interest rate in order for me to pay this loan off. But never gotten an answer or any help in reducing my card interest rate.

name: Michael
review: I applied in mid August with a then-FICO of low 730s... I did get a pre-selected mailer... used the invitation code and applied.Got a “in-processing” type email (as opposed to an auto-approved email.) waited for just about one full day, then called.Spoke to a front line agent who transferred me to underwing.  The underwriter asked a few verifying questions based on what’s in my TU file.  She then approved me for SL$8500.  Got the physical card about 4 days later.Overall, I have no complaints so far.   I did take advantage of the 18mo BT offer (with 3% fee) and set up their iPhone app.Yes, Wells perhaps doesn’t have the cleanest reputation as of late, but for me, based only on this experience, I have no issues to date.

name: robert feiler
review: Thanks, nor have I. They have been actually very good with me, and I am not a rich person by far!

name: Carmelo
review: Great so far! Transition from the first mortgage company was easy and had to do nothing. Hope it stays this way...................

name: Karen
review: High beginning CL (12,500) and great SUB (30K) on the WF Propel card. But, less than a month in first billing period, for which they give no warning. (If not for that, I'd have given 4 stars.) Also, high APRs after intro.

name: James
review: I absolutely love Wells Fargo. I do all my banking there. This is a Cash Wise Visa Card with 1.5% cash back on all purchases. I received a more than generous credit limit with a 0% balance transfer option.

review: They didn’t add any credit balance they are no good My Wells Fargo credit score went down without no reason ????????????

review: They either DONT REPORT  the rite amount, or TransU dosent!!!!& they tell yu not to pay a bill yor fighting!! then change their minds!!!

review: Great service and cash back rewards. You can set up an automated redemption of your rewards that will make it easier tot receive them without going through a long process.

name: Candace
review: I paid off my Wells loan months ago and yet they have failed to send that information to the credit reporting agencies.  Wells have repeatedly proven a disregard for the consumer - I bank with Chase now.

name: Tracey Williams
review: Great card no problems I have been a Wells Fargo customer for many years this is my first card with them. No complaints. I hope to get another card with them in the near future.

name: Julio
review: It’s a very good carD It’s making my credit good and getting more opportunities for my life And also making my credit back that way I can get my new house and my new cars

name: mrfurious
review: great card rewards are great and customer service is great i would highly recommend this card i use it on every purchase i make and use the

name: John Cedric
review: I have not had much transaction from this card but all I can say is so far so good. I will give myself time to try this card more to add more information about this card.

name: Anita B
review: Wells Fargo has been good to me as an account holder with a checking/savings accounts and a secured card. After having a different bank and being denied a secured card with that bank twice, it took a great deal of pondering about whether I should even try for a Well's secured card since I had bad experiences in the  past. Well I applied and I was approved. The experience has been great so far. I pay online and the minute i pay, I get a message giving me my new balance on my credit card. I love that it is easy to keep up with since i can see the balance under my savings account every time I log on. They say they are going to upgrade me to an unsecured card if i maintain a good payment history. I am going to take them at their word since when I opened my checking account they would only let me get a low level account. About a year later, I get a email saying because I did a great job with this account they were upgrading my checking account to regular checking account and I didn't need to do anything. So I believe when  they say they will upgrade me.

name: Anita B
review: Yesterday I got a letter from Wells Fargo that said because of responsible use of my credit card, they will be upgrading my card and returning my deposit next month. All I have to do is keep paying on time and don't exceed my limit until then. I am over the moon since Discover also upgraded me and now Wells Fargo. So after next month I won't have any more secured cards.

name: Bernice
review: Y’all guys report quick when you are late with your payment. But you move really slow when it is pay up to date. So be just as fair on the good report as you are with the bad ones

review: There is no rewards and Wells Fargo don’t wanna increase your credit limit, even when I have a good credit score. This card is not good

review: Was hesitant to apply but wells fargo visa has been great mobil app let's you know your bal.avail credit next pmnt date and covers any overdraft if your checking acct is linked

review: I love this card. We use it for everything. It is accepted everywhere which I like. I have several cards but I get rewards with this card. I love that.

review: I hardly ever use this card. It’s basically used as a back up source of revenue if I ever get in a bind with any of my lower rate interest cards.

review: My Wells Fargo card was a prepaid 500 secured card and I bumped it to 2000 on the 2nd month and 6 months later so 8 months after getting this card they refunded me my money and then the following month they even bumped it up another 1000 so with in 10 months it went to a 3000 unsecured card thank you wells fargo

review: Good card and has cash back toward balance, we love Wells Fargo bank they have been very good to us.  We have been with them for many tears

review: They would not let me pay the loan down quicker without writing a request letter each time I chose to pay more!  I find this plumb annoying!

review: Wells Fargo card served me well. It's a good card to have. Been with them for a while now.great for all kinds of purchases everywhere.

review: Always keeps you informed of any information I need to know.  Great loan company for my family!  I would use Wells Fargo in the future!

name: Thomas Springfield
review: It's a good zero interest card for our Carrier air conditioner. We haven't had to call customer service, so I can't comment on that but that's also good because we haven't had any issues.

name: Scott
review: It’s a good bank and worth considering. Like any Bank you need to understand the benefits and time large purchases to take full advantage of the offered perks.

name: gilfredoo
review: Having this card has helped me a lot to build my credit and learn how to manage money responsibly I started with 300 dollars as a secured credit card after a year it became unsecured and now they increased my limit to 2500 dollars I will recommend this card

review: This card has always been convenient! I have never had a problem with it! After I pay off my balance , I will continue using it to make purchases.

name: Eddie Bailey
review: This is by far the worst bank that I have ever been affiliated with.  Even to the executive level in customer service they take what you say personal and counter your frustrations with aggravations.   Example:  If you call them and complain about fees and other charges associated with your account they don’t suggest alternate ways of saving fees in the future.  I didn’t know that keeping $1000 in your checking account eliminates the charge when purchasing new checks.  Small suggestions go a long way.  Every bank is about making money but this bank is known for its scandalous tactics of padding the bottom line

name: Tony
review: I (Tony) would like to thank you for the opportunity but I'm gonna have to decline. Just would like to thank you again for the opportunity. Maybe next time in the future.

name: Mrityunjay k S
review: Writing for the well's fargo College Visa card.So here is the deal, if you shop alot at groceries and take alot of gas then this card is an amazing one. This card has given so much in thoes categories becuase my family drives and we get groceries. You can also get rewards on Drug store purchase to, but we have insurance to cover it instead. Another cool thing is that you get cell phone protection if you pay your phone bill, but it has to be a while and I think its up to 600 bucks.However if you don't drive or you don't spend enough money on groceries or even worse both. I don't recomend this card as this card has the offers on thoes. You only have 6 months to spend up to 2500 in net (I believe) total purchases. Tho the base is 1%, there are other cards that do better than this like the discover. Also, it's 2% that you will get back becuase the max cash back you can earn is 50.00 during the 6 month period. The 1% is a bonus for other purchases but I don't think its an add on. I only recomended this card for the reason I states earlier. Also get this card when you have experience. This card was my third one and onlt use it to churn the cash back.

name: David
review: Average home loan, not much to say positive or negative. Normally Wells Fargo has predatory practices, fortunately my experience with this loan has been average at best

name: Paul
review: Wells Fargo is a great bank. They are extremely helpful and understanding.  One thing I live about them is that it’s extremely hard to get a over draft.

name: Nestor
review: very flexible and easy to use.  Has come in handy several times, only downfall is that it is too easy to use and could cause you to overspend if not careful.

name: jonr_34
review: Great service and zero interest with a nice online portal. Highly recommend this bank for short term credit lines and online banking.

name: Ben M
review: If you pay your credit cards off monthly, this card and maybe Wells Fargo bank is not for you. I don't mean for this to be a gripe fest but if I can stop you from making a mistake then I have succeeded. I have had this card for about 3 months now and I just closed it today. Let me state that I pay ALL of my bills off every month that they occur and then even ahead if I can. WF has a $1500 payment of mine in limbo as they took it out of one of my personal bank accounts but are holding it. They sent me a "Payment Review" notice on 9/10/19 and are now questioning if my pers bank acct is valid. The letter asked for a voided check or validation from the bank itself. I went to a local branch as told by cust. svc. when I called and provided a check and a copy of the notice. They also took a copy of my ID and sent it off to their finance dept. I was told at that time that it would probably take 1-2 days so I waited 3 days for things to process. I called back today and I was told that "No!" what I was told was wrong as it would take 18 days to process the review. WTF at this point. To top it off there was a new $25 bill out there for payment on 10/4/19. I asked how I was supposed to process it through with this current bank account that I had used previously. No real answer other than I could try and run it through and see what happens. I lost it and cancelled the card at this point with Lizette the C.S. rep as a lousy $2500 rewards card is not worth my time. I will soon be transferring my 401k out of WF shortly as well. Don’t give them your business if this is how they treat customers.

name: jopo
review: I represent a home buyer who applied with Wells Fargo Mortgage in May 27, 2019On August 11, 2019 our offer was accepted on a home. During the month of August, I reminded the Loan Officer Brandon Kwiatek and his manager Ryan Butler that we will need to know if this Home Loan is completely 100% Approved because of the 25 Days on the 3rd Party Addendum deadline. My buyer was repeatedly told by Loan Officer that WF was still "verifying employment". This continued into month of September to still continue to  "verifying employment".  Wells Fargo customer service has totally been a great disappointment in the lack of urgency to their customers. Communication.Phone calls are Never Answered to Loan Officer Brandon and Underwriter Margarita. Only when message is left to Ryan Butler that calls are returned to my home buyer. Communication appears to be One-Way, whenever Wells Fargo is ready to call you. Realtors are not allowed in communication despite TILA-RESPA Authorization. $600 Charge for Appraisal before Loan is Approved. / Credit Report Not Released to Customer.Would it be more prudent to know if the Loan is 100% Approved BEFORE you charge the customer Appraisal Fee? On Sept 4, I asked if the Loan has been 100% Approved or Not. We only get the same excuse of "still processing the loan", so Wells Fargo underwriter cancels the loan without any written permission or consent from Home Buyer.  No document was every sent to my buyer "to Cancel" the loan. We requested a Denial letter if underwriting could not approve this loan and Wells Fargo manager and underwriters refused to issue a denial letter.  As of Sept 19, 2019 this loan is still Not Approved or Denied.  What detestable and disappointing service from this bank.  What a way to treat customers and real estate professionals!  Do Not Use This Mortgage Lender.

name: kroebel
review: They offer cheap and poor review items. The surround system I ordered was listed over $400 and on sale for $280. Sounded so good I jumped on it. My fault for not reading the reviews. Listed for $148 online and reviews were 2.1 out of over 400 reviews. Called to cancel the order and they tried to verify an address I couldn't remember from 15 years ago so they said they couldn't verify me even though I had corrected my new address to place the order. Supervisor said they could not cancel the rewards order and all sales were final. My previous experience with WF has always been negative and will remain negative. Only redeem the cash value because I can assume all their products are cheap.

name: jiachuanmaster
review: Be Really Cautious of Their Bonus Offer for New Accounting OpeningFor those of you who are interested in their promotional bonus offer for new account openings, especially the $400 bonus one, there are a few things you REALLY need to keep in mind: 1. Never ever open an account online if you want to receive a bonus. Online account opening is easy, but it may also be a "trap" for the bank not depositing you the bonus. You need a BONUS CODE during account opening. This code will not show up if you open online even though the ad says it will be automatically applied, but the bank would not acknowledge this. I opened the account through their ads online, it clearly said that their "bonus  code will be automatically applied". However, I fulfilled all the requirements and waited for two months, they said they did not have my BONUS CODE. Are you kidding me? I went to their branches several times and presented the online promo page to them, they still could not figure things out for me. This made me feel like I was fooled by Wells Fargo and their promotional emails! $400 is not a big deal, but nobody likes the feeling of being fooled by others and doesn't know what's going on!2. Make sure you read all the terms and conditions, including the vast majority terms underneath their ads with much smaller characters. This is a common trick that most companies do. If you do not understand any of these terms or you do not know how to do, just don't proceed. You do not want to waste your time and end up getting nothing! 3.Make sure you have all the evidence with you when opening your account. They do not have the incentive to pay you any amount. You should do your job if some things happen!In General, all so-called promotional offers are tactic tricks. Be really cautious of those things and stay away from them if you do not 100% know them!

name: Guacha Fita
review: This is the worst bank ever. I had to close the account because almost clean my savings with monthly charges and the credit card is terrible I had to call every month they hide charges into your monthly payments and the courtesy charges take it away, they put it back. Be aware never get a credit card from this bank, I am so upset and disappointed, you never will think that your money that had been obtained with so much effort fall in this horrible bank that makes disappear your money and a blink. Please do not put your money in their hands.

name: kgratias
review: My debit card got declined from 4 different transactions. No call, no text asking to verify transactions. Turns out their security decided to shut down the account because of suspicious purchases (from places that i have been purchasing from for the past 5 years). Remember, no call, no texts. I finally called them telling them how much time i wasted to get these purchases made. All i got was an apology. They don't know why this happened. The thing about it is, if i make a mistake they charge me with a $35 nsf fee. They Make a mistake i get an apology

name: keithe_22
review: Worst card ever, Fair warning don't use the Earn More Mall for any purchases they will find a way not to give you the extra cash back. Also they had a huge outage where you couldn't use your card it kept getting declined. How does this even happen you have a credit card with them but they have a huge outage and you can't even use the card, luck for me I had another card in my Wallet to use.  Its all okay though interest rate is way too high not like my others where its under 15% Card is now canceled .

name: Troy McCalla
review: Customer service is the worst and lives up to the negative reputation you are reading in the press. They do not return phone calls and constantly give you the run around. Taiya Glas and her supervisor Jamie Thompson offer no help and side step issues without addressing. Worst Bank ever

name: MICHAEL
review: Been using it for 2 years straight, never had any trouble with it and the savings are pretty good! Also got several bonuses! Enabled me to finally remodel my kitchen after 15 years. This is >>THE BEST

name: MICHAEL
review: Gotch man, this is for real!

name: combat_cook8
review: Amazing card right now!! After getting approved for 5K, I bought a needed new refrigerator and tv for my new home and the billing cycle is not even over yet I got my $200 bonus given to me already! So happy to have a good card that’s from who I bank with!

name: chimpp8991
review: I had a contract with a homeowner. Wells Fargo foreclosed but agreed to honor the contract. The homeowners insurance company paid on the claim but Wells Fargo won’t pay me. They stole well over $60,000

name: rocktopus13
review: They have serious issues with their online payment portal which they are not willing to address via Wells Fargo. I STILL have a 30 day late mark on my credit report because of critical errors I found on THEIR website which prevented them from receiving my timely payment. Despite attempts for years now going back and forth with the credit bureaus AND WF Dillards, providing documentation of these proven critical errors on their payment website, proof that they gave NO late fee warnings (although it was their websites fault I was late) the credit bureaus have told me that WF Dillards is still unwilling or too lazy to budge on this. My credit score is literally flawless with 0 late payments and I keep an under 1% utilization ratio. QF Dillards alone has been preventing me from achieving an 800 score and has caused damages in me and my husband's life because we want to refinance our home when my score reaches over 800 like his. I am in contact with my attorney, about to begin litigation. I have found hundreds more people affected by this same issue. If you would like to participate in this too, please contact me. Hey Wells Fargo, this can all be avoided if you simply remove the late mark YOU are responsible for, which is not my fault at all. I have evidence of critical errors on the site during the time I submitted my timely payment, a track record of perfect on time payments with my 13 other credit cards, an email account showing zero warnings or notices from the company, and the evidence points to negligence on behalf of Wells Fargo. Please accept personal accountability. My credit score is worth the time and money I will invest into making this right but if you want to dodge that bullet, please do so now. I closed my account to prevent further abuse from Wells Fargo, but my maiden name on there was Danielle Saviello and my name now is Danielle Schumacher. I can be reached at 707-771-9711. I know now that I'm not the only person affected by this and if this is not addressed, I will make sure to help all the others I've met who have this same issue.

name: denneykent
review: I walked into the bank thinking getting a letter notarized was common practice at banks. They turned this into something difficult. Refused to assist and then when I asked a fellow shopper to assist  they were even rider then the staff. The customers of Wells Fargo per my experience seem like someone I would not want to be a part of. However the gold lining to this story, is I’m currently staying at Hotel Irvine in Los Angeles California, and the wonderful staff was able to help me without a problem and with a cheerful attitude. Moral of the story stay far away as you can from Wells Fargo. I hope you have a great day. :)

name: zlikezebra
review: I have had this secured card for almost 4 years and still have not received my $1000 deposit back. I make on time payments every month and for the first 3 years I always paid the entire balance off in full every month. Once I initiate a payment, they deduct the funds from my primary checking but do not release the credit back to my secured card for a good week. I opened up a checking one year ago hoping they would release my deposit or at a very minimum stop holding my funds for such a long time. Since the card is secured, this seems unnecessary. My card with WF is still secured by my $1000 deposit and they refuse to tell me what I need to do to qualify to receive my deposit back or upgrade to a regular card. They are not transparent and give me a vague answer anytime I have inquired. TERRIBLE. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

name: Nicole Shuell
review: This bank has been good to me.  They are always friendly and helpful.  My local branch in Salem, OR has the best staff!!  They always go above and beyond in the rare occurrences that I've had a problem.

name: scrappykuo
review: I had a checking account with WellsFargo for >5years and found it the worst banking experience. - There's a monthly fee ($14/mo as of March 2019) for not keeping a $7,000 minimum balance in an account, which is higher than any other bank. Most banks have a minimum balance, but the highest I've seen is $2,000 before charging fees. Even the fees with other banks are much lower, like $5/mo. - Customers are charged for new cards when they lose old cards. Most banks don't do this.- Customers are charged for new checks when then finished their old checkbooks. Most banks don't do this.- When calling customer service, there is a long wait and sometimes multiple transfers, where the customer has to repeat their information with each new person, or even from the voice-automated system to a person. - Customers are not refunded anything for out-of-network ATM charges. Most banks offer some reimbursement per month, as much as $20/mo, or are free of charge altogether (which is rarer).These practices are hostile to the customer, and completely characteristic of WellsFargo when you read the news. There are so many other GREAT banks out there. Even ones that offer a cashback or small interest rate on your CHECKING account. Certainly, even the most average banks do not charge as many fees or demand such high deposits. I want to put my money to use. $7,000 in a checking account is too high. Most of that can go to a decent savings account or low-risk short-term equity. WellsFargo is the WORST. I'm going to close my business account with them as well.

name: jaime E hernandez sr
review: has anyone use this card outside the usa same card with out the visa or master cards dont work outside the usa like discover card never work only in a few places.olwas have problem with discovery card outside the usa this seen a great  card by well fargo but dont want a nother card that i cant not use .again

name: Termain
review: Its a Discover Card not DISCOVERY

name: sweeperman
review: I had a heart attack and asked for assistance and was very rudely told there was no help available. Worst customer service I have ever experienced by far! Do yourself a favor and shop around! I wouldn’t recommend them to my worst enemy!

name: connorjskelly
review: Extremely unhelpful and hard to work with. Customer service is hit or miss, sometimes you get someone decent and sometimes not, but banker is never able to work with you at all because of their "policies". Statements that I needed in a timely manner for closing on a house never arrived and had to be reordered and ended up taking several weeks to arrive.  Will definitely be taking my business elsewhere.

name: sean j
review: Worst customer service and Co. ever. See "Better Business Bureau" profile and reviews. 1 star rating and 5 "GOVERNMENT ACTIONS" against them as of 1-17-2019! from "BBB" site 1-17-2019#1 Government Action-CA Attorney General "failure to disclose recording of calls" On March 28, 2016 #2Government Action-CFPB "opening unauthorized accts" On Sep. 8, 2016#3 Government Action-CFPB "Private Student Loans" On August 22, 2016#4Government Action-"OCC v. Wells Fargo" Bank N.A. On April 20, 2018,#5Government Action-"USDOJ Settlement Agreement" On August 1, 2018       These are just the latest, also Judgement for 200+ million for transaction stacking & Action against them for "Mortgage Discrimination against Minorities"  used to show up on BBB as well but in appeal or otherwise now.   Welcome to Wells Fargo!!!

name: Quan Armour
review: I applied for this card recently and was approved with a FICO score 698. This is my second card I have ever applied for. The only downfall is I had to go to an actual Wells Fargo bank for them to verify my identity. I was required to bring two forms of ID and proof of address on a utility bill. 24 hours after that was approved for a credit line of $4500.

name: j_jenkins_j
review: I am just curious, why does Wells Fargo "punish" customers for immediately correcting their accounts?Let me give you a fine example.....I go to a Wells Fargo ATM every 2 weeks on the dot to deposit my paychecks from work. EVERY time I make the deposit, I see on the receipt and online that my money is available IMMEDIATELY - right at that moment. This is always always the case. However.....this week, during my super busy week, I made a slight error in balancing and therefore got slightly overdrawn. So, the very next day I IMMEDIATELY corrected my mistake by depositing a check into the WF ATM like usual. However what happens THIS time?? THIS time the funds are NOT fully immediately available making me STILL overdrawn even though IF the funds were immediately available then I would NOT be overdrawn. These are the moments where us customers need the funds to be available immediately, NOT when everything is okay and dandy, but in moments like these. Whoever is in charge of making the rules within the banking system needs to realize this on a moral level.It gives me bad memories of WAY back in the early 2000's where if I made one, just one slip in a purchase causing my account to be a tad overdrawn, it would charge a fee not for just that one transaction that caused it but for EVERY pending transaction which was highway robbery sometimes resulting in MULTIPLE fees in one day of $35 rather than just that ONE transaction that caused the error. Don't get me wrong, Wells Fargo doesn't do this anymore (thank God) but it's moments like this week that make me question the morals of this bank.I think within these next weeks I'll look into switching to Chase bank, which my family loves. A company's morals reflect loudly on the customer experience.

name: rajaa336
review: Applied dec 14 2018 was approved it is now January 8 2019 still no card. Around Christmas I called to see what was going on after I got a statement saying they had closed the account before I even got a card or they took the deposit. Talked to a supervisor who said they would call me back the next day. Now all of a sudden they took the deposit the next morning when the supervisor called back she had no clue yet I'm still waiting for my money or the card

name: josilynsmith355
review: Applied for card went in multiple times "in store" to pay with money orders and had proof with money order stubs it was still marked as no payments so I called them and got transferred around for 45min! Now I have to get STATEMENTS from my bank and send it in to wells Fargo because some REALLY BAD customer service both in store at the Dillards (I used to love to shop in) and over the phone I have filed many disputes with all 3 credit beaurous and they "sugested" I contact the CREDITOR which means back to square 1. It was reported as NO payments and bad debt charge off, when in fact the opposite is true and I have proof from my bank.....horrible customer service I will never do business with this company...a bunch of lying dishonest thieving !@#$!!

name: Tina Huston
review: I have a 781 credit score. I applied for a card with WF. I lifted one credit freeze for them to do the credit check.  They declined me and lied that I had a delinquent account.  I spent a lot of time checking into their claim only to find out that there was NO delinquency on the credit report they ran.  I talked with an underwriter who asked me to unfreeze my other 2 credit reports, he said he would call me between 9:00-9:30 the next morning to manually go over my reports.  He never called.  I called and a different underwriter declined my app saying that I didn't have enough revolving credit history (absolute nonsense) and that there was nothing he could do.  So, now they've pinged two of the credit bureaus and those hard pings will be on my credit report until 2020.  Turn and run from Wells Fargo!!!  Turn and run!!!

name: taramarie480
review: I recently opened a credit card account with Wells Fargo with the objective to transfer another card balance to the new one and pay down the balance in the 12 month no interest time period. I made two payments (one of $400.00 and another of $1000.00) last week in order to both pay down the balance but also take advantage of the triple points the card offers. However, even though my payments put me well below my credit limit, my account shows $0.00 credit available. When I called to research this, I was informed that because I made a large payment from a non Wells Fargo bank, that the payment was on hold until the 6th of December. That is 2 weeks after the payment was made. When I challenged this, I was told it could be escalated but that I would need to fax a copy of my bank statement from before and after the payment. This is none of Wells Fargo's business! If the money makes it from my bank to them and the payment doesn't bounce, then let me access my line of credit to the amount you approved me for. As it stands, the funds are no longer in my bank account because the payment has posted, but I cannot use the credit card because Wells Fargo has unreasonable and financially controlling practices.

name: tstarkey
review: I received my Well's Fargo Cash Wise Card and Activated 10-29-18. I spent the required 1,000.00 that day. I received my 200.00 Cash Bonus Check today 11-26-18! No Complaints here! Was a wonderful experience for me! Thanks!

name: jesussara197
review: So we have been doing business with them for about 3 years (the whole family).We had checkings, saving accounts and credit cards with them.We had About 700,000$ in our accounts in about 2 years.** Somehow for some reason they decided to close our accounts! And they did not give us any explanation whyyy!**They just sent us 4 letters and they said "we have decided to close your accounts, we do not explain why, and this decision can not be changed!"We did not have any legal issues or any financial problems or anything! So we started thinking maybe because we are permanent residents or because of our national origin they did that!We are not sure why since they didn't say why it happened but i can say that they didn't respect their loyal customers.Their decision caused us problems with paying our bills and our life but ALL I CAN SAY is that stay away from this BANK! Specially if you're immigrant.They don't even deserve 1 Star...

name: Marina T
review: My story with wells fargo personal loan:my credit score 825my wife credit score 750 We have no debs!Our annual income over 200k I am with wells fargo for 15 years, my wife for 7 years ...We decided to remodel our house and need $40,000 We were 100% sure wells fargo will approve us for personal loan, as we have excellent credit score, no debs and high income.And guess what? They didn’t approve us!!!  So, when you need support and some help you can’t rely on your bank??? Thats sucks! It shouldn’t be that way! (They know me for 15 years and my wife for 7 years)I am really-really upset with this situation...I am closing all accounts and don’t want to deal with them anymore...We can tight our belts and safe $40,000 in 6 months and do remodeling for cash! F*** Y*u wells fargo! You just lost 2 good customers!P.S They say, they give personal loans for vacation, wedding etc. Don’t trust them! They will not give you a penny! And it doesn’t matter how good or bad your credit score!!!

name: Chad McCormick
review: Overdraft protection is a complete scam. Wells Fargo is unethically forcing this "service" on their customers - which requires they pay $35 every time they overdraft. There is no way to turn this "service" off, and you will be lucky if you get HALF of ONE fee back. It is not about helping consumers what-so-ever. They won't hesitate to decline you when you swipe your card, but they let reoccurring payments go thru every time. It is 100% about taking money from people.Two small reoccurring payments ($70 overdraft fee in one day) just cost me 10% of my paycheck. Wells Fargo, and any other bank forcing this immoral service on their consumers should be fined and charged with wire fraud.I am so done with this deceitful bank.

name: Raven Knight
review: Take your money elsewhere. These conservative 18th-century landbarons fake fee-after-fee while selling your information and making fake accounts in your name to double invest your savings accounts in. Easily one of the most evil companies on the planet.

name: harleydot
review: No help for hurricane victims.  Will defer 3 payments 90 days, but at 90 days, all 3 payments are due.  That helps no one that has been devistated.  Other establishments are deferring to the end of the loan.

name: Michael Gardner
review: Arecashwiseand propelamerican express the same. Wells fargo applied for American express propel denied wells Fargo creditwise has came upon wallethub looked at my scores. Ask me to apply don't want to be deined

name: georgiastreet
review: CAUTION they transfer $$$ to your credit card if you apply online.  I did not even activate the card I wanted to read all the information before I transferred to pay off credit card.  I had questions and called but they did not stop the transfer of  funds.

name: Kevin Marel
